bofm-title 0:
[center][font_size=26]Say Libro nen Mormon[/font_size][/center]

Say Kasulatan ya Insulat na Lima nen Mormon Dia ed Saray Piligo a Nanlapu ed Saray Piligo nen Nephi

Dia ed ontan, saya so sakey a pinatikey a kasulatan nipaakar ed saray totoo nen Nephi, tan ontan met ed saray Lamanite—Nisulat onkana ed saray Lamanite, a sikara so nakdaan ed kailalakan na Israel; tan ontan met ed saray Judio tan Gentiles—Insulat ed panamegley na gangan, tan ontan met ed panamegley na espiritu na profesiya tan puyan—Insulat tan inkapot, tan insinop ed Katawan, pian ag ira naderal—Ya onsabi ed panamegley na palabo tan pakapanyari na Dios angan dia ed pañgipatalus ed saraya—Inkapot na lima nen Moroni, tan insinop ed Katawan, ya onsabi ed genap a panaon ed panamegley na Gentiles—Say impañgipatalus ed saya dia ed panamegley na palabo na Dios.

Sakey a pinatikey a kasulatan a nanlapu ed Libro nen Ether met, a saya so sakey a kasulatan nipaakar ed saray totoo nen Jared, a sikara so nitaytayak ed saman a panaon nen say Katawan kinewkew to so salita na saray totoo, sanen sikara so mampapaalagey na tori pian makasabi ed tawen—A saya so mañgipanengneng ed saray nakdaan ed kailalakan na Israel no anto so saray ankakabaleg a beñgatla a ginawa na Katawan ed saray kaamaan da; tan komon nakabatan da so saray paknaan na Katawan, ya ag ira nibantak ya ando la ya ando—Tan ontan met onkana a pankuyong ed saray Judio tan Gentiles a si Jesus sikato so Cristo, say Andi-Angaan a Dios, ya ipapanengneng to so inkasikato ed amin a bansa—Tan natan, no wala so saray kakulañgan saraya so liñgo na totoo; lapu ed ontan, ag yo tututolan so saray nipaakar ed Dios, pian komon sikayo so narumog ya andi-dukit ed yuroñgan na panañgokoman nen Cristo.

Say gendat a patalus so nanlapu ed saray piligo ed English ed panamegley nen Joseph Smith, Jun.
introduction 0:
[center][font_size=26]Parungtal[/font_size][/center]

Say Libro nen Mormon so sakey a libro na masanto a kasulatan a mipara ed Biblia. Saya so sakey a kasulatan nipaakar ed piruruñgo na Dios ed saray kadaanan a totoo a nanayam ed America tan say lugan to so inkagnap na andi-angaan ya evangelio.

Say libro so insulat na dakel a kadaanan a profeta dia ed panamegley na espiritu na profesiya tan puyan. Saray salita ra, so nisulat ed saray piligo a balitok, so inulit tan pinatikey nen profeta a managsulat na awaran a manñgaran na Mormon. Say kasulatan mañgiiter na salaysay na duara ya ankabaleg a bansa ya asabi ra so atagey a kipapasen na aliguas. Say sakey so nanlapu ed Jerusalem nen 600 S.C., tan kayari to nia nansian ed duara a bansa, ya akabatan a saray Nephite tan saray Lamanite. Saman so sakey sinmabi ya asasakbay sanen say Katawan kinewkew to so saray salita diman ed Tori na Babel. Saya ya olop so akabatan a saray Jaredite. Kayari na libu-libo a taon, sikara ya amin so aderal likud ed saray Lamanite, tan sikara so manunaan señgeg na saray American Indian.

Say sankamakanaan ya agawa a nisulat ed Libro nen Mormon so say dili ya impampulong na Katawan Jesu Cristo ed limog na saray Nephite ag abayag nen kayari to ya inmoli ed bilay. Saya so añgiter na doctrina na evangelio, añgidatak ed plano na kilalaban, tan mañgibaga ed saray totoo no anto so gawaen da pian nagamoran da so kareenan ed saya a bilay tan andi-angaan a kilalaban ed bilay ya onsabi.

Kayari na impakasumpal nen Mormon ed saray insulat to, iniawat to so kasulatan ed anak to a laki si Moroni, a sikato so añgiarum na pigara a salita to a dili tan iniamot to so saray piligo ed pukdol na Cumorah. Sanen Septiembre 21, 1823, si Moroni lamlamang, ed saman magloria la, ya inmoli ed bilay a too, so nampanengneng ed si Profeta Joseph Smith tan binañgatan to nipaakar ed saman so kadaanan a kasulatan tan say getma a pañgipatalus ed salita ya English.

Ed genap a panaon saray piligo so niawat la ed si Joseph Smith, a sikato so añgipatalus ed saraya ed panamegley na palabo tan pakapanyari na Dios. Say kasulatan natan so nipalapag la ed dakel a salita a saya so balo tan kaaruman a tasi a si Jesu Cristo so Anak na mabilay a Dios tan amin ya ondago ed sikato tan ononor ed saray gangan tan tutuntonen ed evangelio to so nilaban.

Nipaakar ed saya a kasulatan si Profeta Joseph Smith inkuan to: “Imbagak ed saray kaagian a say Libro nen Mormon so sikato so sankadugaan nen say dinan a libro dia ed dalin, tan say bato a sekder na relihion tayo, tan say too lalo a maasinger ed Dios ed panamegley na itumbok to ed saray bañgat ed saya, nen say arum a libro.”

Onarum ed si Joseph Smith, say Katawan so añgiter ni na labinsakey a makanengneng ed balitok a piligo ed inkasikara a dili tan manmaliw a nidumadoma a tasi na katuaan tan kasantosan na Libro nen Mormon. Saray nisulat a paneknek da so nilugan dia a “Say Paneknek na Talora a Tasi” tan “Say Paneknek na Walora a Tasi.”

Babagaan mi so amin a totoo ed inerman a pasen a basaen da so Libro nen Mormon, a motekteken da ed puso ra so talus na balita a lugan to, tan ontepet ed Dios, say Andi-angaan ya Ama, dia ed ñgaran nen Cristo no say libro so tua. Saraman so mañgituloy ed saya a kimey tan ontepet ya awalaan na pananisia so makagamor na paneknek na katuaan tan kasantosan na saya dia ed pakapanyari na Espiritu Santo. (Nengneñgen so Moroni 10:3–5.)

Saraman so makagamor ed saya a masanto a tasi manlapu ed Masanto ya Espiritu onsabi met ed sikara so pikakabat ed panamegley na saman met lamlamang a pakapanyari a si Jesu Cristo sikato so Manañgilaban na mundo, a si Joseph Smith so managpuyan to tan profeta ed saraya a sampot ya agew, tan say Simbaan nen Jesu Cristo na Saray Sasantos ed Kaunoran ya Agew so panarian na Katawan a niletneg lamet dia ed dalin, sakey a paraan ed komadua ya isabi na Mesias.
three 0:
[center][font_size=26]Say Paneknek na Talora a Tasi[/font_size][/center]

Nakabatan komon na amin a bansa, sankakanayon, salita, tan totoo, a dia ed sikara saya a kimey so makasabi: A sikami, dia ed panamegley na gracia na Dios Ama, tan Katawan mi a Jesu Cristo, anengneng mi so saray piligo a lugan to so saya a kasulatan, a saya so kasulatan nipaakar ed saray totoo nen Nephi, tan ontan met na saray Lamanite, ya agagi da, tan ontan met ed saray totoo nen Jared, a nanlapu ed tori ya asalita la. Tan kabat mi met a saraya so impatalus ed panamegley na palabo tan pakapanyari na Dios, tan say voces to so añgibalikas ed saya ed sikami; kanian kabat mi ya angapo so panduarua a saya a kimey so tua. Tan paneknekan mi met ya anengneng mi so saray akatatak a wala ed saray piligo; tan saraya so nipanengneng ed sikami ed panamegley na pakapanyari na Dios, tan aliwa a too. Tan ibawag mi ed saray salita na kaolimekan, a sakey ya angel na Dios so linmeksab a nanlapu ed tawen, tan inawit to tan iniarap to ed saray mata mi, ya amuria mi tan anengneng mi so saray piligo, tan saray akatatak diman; tan kabat mi a dia ed gracia na Dios Ama, tan Katawan mi a Jesu Cristo, kanian anengneng mi tan tasian mi a saraya ya a beñgatla so tua. Tan saya so makapakelaw ed saray mata mi. Angaman ontan, say voces na Katawan so añgigangan ed sikami a tasian mi so saya; dia ed ontan, pian naunor mi so saray gangan na Dios, iter mi so paneknek ed saraya a beñgatla. Tan kabat mi a no manmaliw kami a matuor ed si Cristo, nalinisan mi so saray kawes mi ed dala na amin a totoo, tan sikami so narumog ya angapo so mansa ed arap na yuroñgan na panañgokoman nen Cristo, tan miayam kami ed sikato ed saray andi-angaan a katawenan. Tan say kagalañgan wala ed Ama, tan say Anak, tan dia ed Espiritu Santo, a saksakey a Dios. Amen.

Oliver Cowdery

David Whitmer

Martin Harris
eight 0:
[center][font_size=26]Say Paneknek na Walora a Tasi[/font_size][/center]

Nakabatan komon na amin a bansa, sankakanayon, salita, tan totoo, a dia ed sikara saya a kimey so makasabi: A si Joseph Smith, Jun., say añgipatalus ed saya a kimey, impanengneng to ed sikami so saray piligo ya asalita, a say nengneng to so balitok; tan no kaonoñgan so kadakel na bolong ya impatalus na asalita ya Smith so abembenan na saray lima mi; tan anengneng mi met so saray akatatak diman, ya amin say nengneng da so kadaanan a kimey, tan nidumadoma ya inkagawa. Tan saya so paneknekan mi ed saray salita na kaolimekan, a say asalita ya Smith impanengneng to ed sikami, tan anengneng mi tan binembenan mi, tan kabat mi ya angapo so panduarua a say asalita ya Smith wala ed sikato so saray piligo ya asalita mi la. Tan iter mi so kañgaranan mi ed mundo, pian tasian mi ed mundo so saman so anengneng mi. Tan ag kami mantitila, say Dios tasian to so saya.

Christian Whitmer

Jacob Whitmer

Peter Whitmer, Jun.

John Whitmer

Hiram Page

Joseph Smith, Sen.

Hyrum Smith

Samuel H. Smith

[center][font_size=26]Say Paneknek nen Profeta Joseph Smith[/font_size][/center]

Saray dili a salita nen Profeta Joseph Smith nipaakar ed say insabi na Libro nen Mormon so:

“Sanen labi … na komaduamplo tan sakey ed Septiembre (1823) … Nen siak la so akaparaan ya ongapo a mampikasi tan onkerew ed Sankamakapanyarian a Dios ….

“Legan ya ontatawag ak ed Dios, naimanok so sakey a liwawa ya onleletaw ed silir ko, a saya so nampatuloy anga ed say silir ko so maliwliwawa nen say kaaguan, sanen bigla a pinmayawar so sakey a too ed kaabay na dukolan ko, a manalalagey ed dagem, tan saray sali to so ag onsasagar ed datal.

“Wala so kawes to a maawang a nidumadoma ed inkaputi. Saya so inkaputi angapo ni so angan dinan a pañgipareñgan dia ed tapew na dalin ya anengneng ko; ni say panisiaan ko a wala so beñgatla a makaraldalin a nayari a gawaen a mapalalo ed puti tan kirlap a siñga nengneng to. Saray lima to angapo so sakbong da, ontan met ed saray taklay to, ya atagtagey na daiset ed saray ñgaloñgaluan to; tan ontan met, saray sali to angapo so sapin da, ya angan saray bikking to, ya atagtagey na daiset ed saray kalit-kalit. Say ulo tan beklew to angapo so sakbong met. Naimanok ya angapo la so arum a sulong to no ag saya labat so maawang a kawes, lapu ed saya so akalokas, kanian sankanengneng ko so pagew to.

“Aliwa labat a say kawes to so mapalalo ed puti, no ag iñgen say tibukel na inkatoo to so magloria ya ag naipaliwawa, tan say indeñgan to so peteg a siñga kirmat. Say silir mapalalo so liwawa to, balet aliwa a siñga inkaliwawa na kaliber-liber na saya a too. Sanen unaan ko ya anengneng, siak so ataktakot; balet saman a takot ag abayag naandi ed siak.

“Tinawag to ak ed ñgaran ko, tan inkuan to ed siak a sikato so sakey ya igagangan a nanlapu ed kawalaan na Dios a nibaki ed siak, tan say ñgaran to Moroni; tan say Dios wala so sakey a kimey ya iter to a pagawa ed siak; tan say ñgaran ko nikana ed maong tan mauges ed limog na amin a bansa, sankakanayon, tan saray salita, odino nampara a maong tan mauges a pantotungtoñgan ed limog na amin a totoo.

“Say inkuan to wala so sakey a libro ya insinop, ya insulat ed balitok a piligo, a mañgibabaga nipaakar ed inmuona a totoo a nanayam ed saya a maawang a dalin, tan no iner so nanlapuan da. Tan inkuan to met a say inkagnap na andi-angaan ya Evangelio so nilugan ed saya, ya iniawat na Manañgilaban ed saray kadaanan a nanaayam dia;

“Ontan met, wala so duara a bato a wala ed pilak a basikaw—tan saraya a bato, so akapeket ed sakey a salimbeng na pagew, so manotugyop ed tatawagen a Urim tan Tumim—ya impisinop kaiba na saraman so piligo; tan say pankayarian tan pañgikana ed saraya a bato sikara so nikuan a Makapikabat ed Linawa na Dios ed saray kadaanan odino inmuona a panaon; tan say Dios imparaan to so saraya ed getma a pañgipatalus ed saya a libro.

“Lamet, inkuan to ed siak, a no naalak so saraman a piligo ya asalita to—lapu ed ag ni asabi so panaon a pakaala ed saraya—ag ko nepeg ya ipanengneng so saraya ed angan siopaman a too; ni say salimbeng na pagew a kaiba na Urim tan Tumim; likud ed saraman labat a totoo a nigangan a pañgipanengneñgan ko; no saya so gawaen ko siak so naderal. Legan to a mitotungtong ed siak nipaakar ed saraman so piligo, say payawar so alokasan ed kanunotan ko a sankanengneng ko so pasen ya añgisinopan ed saray piligo, tan malinlinew tan nidumaduma kanian amtak so pasen lamet sanen dinalaw ko so saya.

“Kayari na saya a tungtoñgan, anengneng ko so liwawa ed dalem na silir ko a ginmapo a nantipon ed kaliber-liber na saya a too ya akitungtong ed siak, tan nampatuloy ya onia, anga ed say silir ko so binmiluñget lamet, likud labat ed kaliber-liber to a tuloy, sanen, bigla ya anengneng ko, a siñga, sakey a tubo a linmukas anga ed tawen, tan sikato so sinmegep ed tagey anga ed sikato so nagnap a naandipat, tan say silir ko so pinmawil ed gendat a nengneng to sakbay a pinmarungtal so saya a mañgatatawen a liwawa.

“Siak so akarukol a mannonunot ed nibiibiig ya agawa, tan ontan la so kabaleg na pankelaw ko ed saray imbaga ed siak na saya so nidumadoma ya ibabaki; sanen, dia ed kapegleyan na panmomotektek ko, bigla ya anengneng ko a say silir ko ongagapo lamet a naliliwawaan, tan dia ed kakirem, a siñga sanen inmuna, saman lamlamang a mañgatatawen ya ibabaki so wala lamet ed abay na dukolan ko.

“Sikato so ginmapo, tan lamet imbaga to ya amin so saraman lamlamang so binitla to ed saman so akaona ya indalaw to, ya angapo so nauman; a sanen asumpal la, impakabat to ed siak so saray ankabaleg a panañgokom ya onsabi ed dalin, kaiba so saray baleg a pakagonigon lapu ed gawat, espada, tan salot; tan saraya a makapaermen a panañgokom so onsabi ed dalin ed saya a kailalakan. Kayari to ya imbaga so saraya a beñgatla, sikato so sinmegep lamet a siñga ginawa to nen inmuna.

“Dia ed saya a bekta, agay la so kaaralem na saray bakat ya agawa ed nunot ko, kanian say pakakaugip so naandi la ed saray matak, tan akadukol ak a mapalalo so pankelkelaw ko ed mandapag ya anengneng tan nadñgel ko. Balet agay la so inkabiglaan ko sanen anengneng ko lamet so saman lamlamang ya ibabaki ed abay na dukolan ko, tan nadñgel ko ya inulit odino sinalita to lamet ed siak so saraman a beñgatla a siñga nen inmuna; tan iniarum to so sakey a pasakbay ed siak, ya inkuan to ed siak a si Satanas salien to ak a tuksoen (lapu ed kairapan na boleg nen amak), ya alaen ko so saraman a piligo ed gagala pian onyaman. Sinebelan to ak ed saya, inkuan to a kaukolan ya angapo so arum a gagalak ed pañgala na saray piligo no ag say pañgigloria ed Dios, tan kaukolan ag ak natanguyor na angan dinan ya arum a getma no ag say pañgipaalagey na panarian To; odino andi ag ko naala so saraya.

“Kayari na saya a komatlo a dalaw, sikato so sinmegep lamet ed tawen a siñga nen inmuna, tan siak so atilak lamet a mannonunot ed inkidoma na saman so nagunoyan ko labat apalabas; sanen kasipusipot to a sinmegep a pitlo iman so mañgatatawen ya ibabaki, say lalong so kinmokaok, tan naimanok a kabuasan la manaya, kanian say impantungtong mi nilaknaban to so katibukelan na saman a labi.

“Ag abayag siak so binmañgon ed dukolan ko, tan, siñga unong ed kaugalian, linma ak la ed saray nakaukolan ko a kimeyan ed saman ya agew; balet, dia ed panasalik a mankimey a siñga dia ed saray imbebeneg a panaon, alikas ko a naandian ak na kasil ya ag ko nayarian so mankimey. Si amak, a sikato so kaibak a mankikimey, so akaimano a wala so makulang ed siak, tan imbaga to ed siak ya onsempet ak la ed abong. Pinmikal ak ya onla ed abong; balet, nen sasalien ko a basilen so alar ya ompaway ed alog a kawalaan mi, naandian ak la na biskeg, kanian siak so niparukol ed dalin a pakaskasi, tan dia ed agano a bekta angapo so antokaman ya amtak.

“Say unaonaan a natandaan ko so sakey a voces a misasalita ed siak, a tatawagen to ak ed ñgaran ko. Tinmañgay ak, tan anengneng ko so saman lamlamang ya ibabaki a manalalagey ed tagey na uloan ko, ya aliber na liwawa a siñga nen inmuna. Tinungtong to lamet ya amin so saraman so imbaga to la ed siak ed saman ya imbeneg a labi tan imbaki to ak ya onla ed si amak tan ibagak ed sikato so saman so payawar tan saray gangan a naawat ko.

“Siak so tinmulok; pinmawil ak ed si amak ed alog, tan sinalitak ed sikato so amin ya agawa. Say inebat to ed siak a saman so nanlapu ed Dios, tan imbaga to ed siak ya onla ak tan gawaen ko so unong ed ingangan na saman ya ibabaki. Sinmipot ak ed alog, tan linma ak ed saman so pasen ya imbaga na ibabaki a kawalaan ya añgisinopan na saray piligo; tan lapu ed malinlinew so payawar ya niiter ed siak nipaakar ed saya, kabat ko so pasen dia ed bekta a sinmabi ak diman.

“Asinger ed bario na Manchester, luyag na Ontario, New York, wala diman so manalalagey a balbaleg a pukdol, tan sankaatageyan ed amin ed saman a pasen. Dia ed sagur a dapag na saya a pukdol, ag arawi ed tuktok, dia ed silong na sakey a bato a babaleg, wala diman so saray piligo, akalogan ed kahon a bato. Saya a bato so makapal tan malimpek ed pegley dia ed tagey, tan maimpis so mamaarap ed gilig, kanian say pegley to so nanengneng ed tapew na dalin, balet say amin a gilig to so atabonan na dalin.

“Sanen naekal ko la so dalin, añgala ak na sakey a pansukit, a saya so insurob ko ed gilig na bato, tan dia ed daiset labat a biskeg saya so abikual ko a niatagey. Tinakiling ko, tan tua anengneng ko so saray piligo, say Urim tan Tumim, tan say salimbeng na pagew, unong ed imbaga na saman so ibabaki. Saman so kahon a kawalaan to so agawa ed nanlalaktipan a bato ed siñga uri na semento. Dia ed dalem na kahon wala so duara a bato ya impambangkalañgan ed kahon tan dia ed saraya a bato akagaton so saray piligo tan saray arum a beñgatla a kaiba to.

“Sinalik ya agwaten, balet sinebelan ak na saman so ibabaki, tan lamet imbaga to ed siak a say panaon a pañgipaway ed saraya so ag ni sinmabi, ni say saya, anga ed apat taon manlapu ed saman a panaon; balet imbaga to ed siak a kaukolan ko so onla ed saman a pasen a duga-duga a sakey taon manlapu ed saman a panaon, tan diman sikato met so mibana ed siak, tan kaukolan ya ituloy ko a gawaen so onia anga ed isabi na panaon a pañgalak ed saray piligo.

“Unong ed saya, ya inkigangan ko, linma ak diman ed balang sampot na taon, tan balang sakey a panaon na iakar ko narumog ko diman so saman lamlamang ya ibabaki, tan inawat ko so bilin tan kakabatan manlapu ed sikato balang makapantungtong kami, nipaakar ed no anto so gawaen na Katawan, tan no panon tan no anto a pamaakaran so pañgikurang na panarian to ed saray kaunoran ya agew.

“Ag abayag sinmabi so panaon a pañgala ed saray piligo, say Urim tan Tumim, tan say salimbeng na pagew. Dia ed komaduamplo tan dua ya agew ed Septiembre, sanlibo walora a lasus tan duamplo tan pito, siak so linma unong na gendat ed sampot na sakey a taon diman ed pasen ya añgisinopan, saman lamlamang a mañgatatawen ya ibabaki initer to ed siak so saraya katekep na saray eebatan ko: A siak so oneebat ed saraya; a no napaulyan ko so saraya a naala makaseñgeg ed kakulañgan na asikaso, odino kakulañgan na alwar, siak so nataksing; balet no ikanak ya amin so peleng ko pian nasimpitan so saraya, anga ed, saraya so alaen na saman ya ibabaki, saraya so niagel.

“Ag abayag atalusan ko so rason no akin onman la so elet na bilin ya inawat ko ed pañgiagel ed saraya, tan no akin saman ya ibabaki imbaga to a no nasumpal ko la so nakaukolan ed limak, so alaen to la so saraya. Tan ag abayag ed impakapikabat da a saya so wala la ed siak, saray sankaksilan a biskeg so nikana pian naala ra so saraya ed siak. Amin a kasiliban a nayari a gawaen so nikana ed saya a gagala. Say pamasegsegang so nanmaliw ya ampait tan mapalalo nen say linmabas, tan saray karaklan maimano ra ya andi tonda pian saraya so naala ra ed siak no nayari. Balet dia ed kakabatan na Dios, saraya so nansiansia ed limak, anga ed impakasumpal ko na kaukolan ed limak. Sanen, unong ed talusan, say ibabaki inala to so saraya, iniawat ko so saraya ed sikato; tan saraya wala ra ed sikato anga ed saya ya agew, komadua ya agew na Mayo, sanlibo walora a lasus tan talomplo tan walo.”

Onkana ed naspot a listaan, nengneñgen so Joseph Smith—Awaran, dia ed Perlas ya Ankabli, tan History of the Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints, libro 1, tekap 1 anga ed 6.

Say kadaanan a kasulatan a saraya so pinmaway a nanlapu ed dalin a siñga voces na saray totoo a mansasalita a manlalapu ed sapok, tan nipatalus ed peles a salita ed panamegley na palabo tan pakayari na Dios unong na pamaneknek na Mañgatatawen a pamatua, so unaan ya impalapag ed mundo ed English ed taon 1830 a The Book of Mormon.
explanation 0:
[center][font_size=26]Say Antikey a Paliwawa Nipaakar ed Say Libro nen Mormon[/font_size][/center]

Say Libro nen Mormon so sakey a masagrado a kasulatan na saray totoo ed kadaanan ya America, tan saraya so nitatak ed piligo a mital. Wala so apatira a kanengneñgan na mital a piligo so asalita ed saya a libro lamlamang.

Saray Piligo nen Nephi, so awalaan na duara a kanengneñgan: Saray Ankelag a Piligo tan Ankabaleg a Piligo. Saray inmuna so nigetar ed saray maespiritu ya agawgawa tan say impampulong tan saray bañgat na saray profeta balet saray saguinunor so malaglaem a sinakop na makaraldalin ya awaran na saray abitla a totoo (1 Nephi 9:2–4). Bangbalet, manlapu ed panaon nen Mosiah, saray ankelag a piligo so atekepan met na saray makana a beñgatla a maespiritu.

Saray Piligo nen Mormon, a kawalaan na pinatekey a kasulatan nen Mormon a nanlapu ed saray Ankabaleg a Piligo nen Nephi, ya awalaan na dakel a paliwawa. Saraya a piligo so nanlugan met na kasolduñgan na awaran ya insulat nen Mormon tan inaruman na anak to a laki a si Moroni.

Saray Piligo nen Ether, so mañgiparungtal ed awaran na saray Jaredite. Saya a kasulatan so pinatikey nen Moroni, ya añgisalet na saray salita to a dili tan impankasakey to so kasulatan ed amin-amin ya awaran dia ed silong na paulo ya “Libro nen Ether”.

Saray Piligo a Gansa ya awit na saray totoo nen Lehi a nanlapu ed Jerusalem nen 600 S.C. Saray lugan to nia so “limara a libro nen Moses, … Tan say kasulatan met na saray Judio nanlapu ed gapo, … a mampaleksab anga ed gapo na oley nen Sedekias, ari na Juda; Tan ontan met saray profesiya na saray masanto a profeta” (1 Nephi 5:11–13). Dakerakel ya inulit a salita so nanlapu ed saraya a piligo, a mañgipapatnag a si Isaias tan saray arum ni a profeta ed Biblia tan angapo ed Biblia, so niparungtal dia ed libro nen Mormon.

Say Libro nen Mormon titibukelen na labinlima a kabiañgan odino inkaapag, ya akabatan, a wala so sakey a nibiig, a libro, a balang sakey so niñgaran ed too a malaglaem a nansulat. Say unaan a kabiañgan (saray unaan ya anemira a libro, a mansampot ed Omni) so impatalus a nanlapu ed Ankelag a Piligo nen Nephi. Dia ed nanleetan na libro nen Omni tan Mosiah so sakey ya insalet a tinawag a Saray Salita nen Mormon. Saya ya insalet pansuldoñgan to so kasulatan a nitatak ed Ankelag a Piligo a pantekepen to so Ankabaleg a Piligo a pinatikey nen Mormon.

Say sankarukeyan a kabiañgan, sakopen to so manlapu ed Mosiah anga ed Mormon, tekap 7, so patalus na kasulatan pinatikey nen Mormon ed saray Ankabaleg a Piligo nen Nephi. Say kasampotan a kabiañgan, manlapu ed Mormon, tekap 8, ya anga ed sampot na libro, so intatak na laki ya anak nen Mormon a si Moroni, a sikato, nen asumpal to ya insulat so impambilay nen ama to, ginawa to so pinatikey a kasulatan na saray Jaredite (say Libro nen Ether) tan dia ed kasampotan iniarum to so kabiañgan ya akabatan a Libro nen Moroni.

Sanen odino ñgalñgali a say taon ed 421 K.C., si Moroni, say sampot ed saray Nephite a profeta a managsulat na awaran, inkapot to so sagrado a kasulatan tan saya so iniamot ed Katawan, ya ipaway ed saray saguinunor ya agew, unong ed nipasakbay a voces na Dios ed panamegley na saray kadaanan a profeta to. Sanen K.C. 1823, saya lamlamang a Moroni, dia ed saman sikato la so inmoli ed bilay ya inkatoo, dinalaw to si Profeta Joseph Smith tan dia ed saman iniawat so saray atatakan a piligo ed sikato.
1-ne 1:
[center][font_size=26]Say Unaan a Libro nen Nephi[/font_size][/center]

Say Impanoley tan Impampulong to

Say awaran nen Lehi tan si asawa to a Sariah, tan apatira ya anak to a lalaki, ya atawag na, (manlapu ed sankapañguloanan) Laman, Lemuel, Sam, tan Nephi. Say Katawan pinasakbayan to si Lehi ya ontaynan ed dalin na Jerusalem, lapu ed sikato so namprofesiya ed saray totoo nipaakar ed saray karelmeñgan da tan pilalek da a deralen so bilay to. Sikato so nambaroy a talora ya agew ed kalawakan a kaiba to so boleg to. Si Nephi intarok to so saray agagi to ya ompawil ed dalin na Jerusalem pian alaen da so kasulatan na saray Judio. Saray awaran na saray irap da. Inala ra so saray anak a bibii nen Ishmael tan inasawa da ira. Inala ra so saray boleg da tan sinmipot la ra ya amaarap ed kalawakan. Saray irap da tan segsegang da ed kalawakan. Say tinunton da ed impambaroy da. Akasabi ra ed baleg a danum. Saray agagi nen Nephi inmalsa ra sumpa ed sikato. Sikara so kinewkew to, tan nangawa na baleg a bapor. Tinawag da so saman a pasen na Daakan. Binaliw da so baleg a danum ya anga ed dalin na sipan, tan arum ni ra. Saya so unong ed saray kasulatan nen Nephi; odino dia ed sananey a salita, siak, Nephi, so nansulat ed saya a kasulatan.

[center][font_size=26]Tekap 1[/font_size][/center]

[i]Si Nephi ginapoan to so kasulatan na saray totoo to—Si Lehi anengneng to ed payawar so lusek ya apoy tan nambasa ed libro na profesiya—Indayew to so Dios, impasakbay to so isabi na Mesias, tan improfesiya to so kaderal na Jerusalem—Sikato so pinasegsegang na saray Judio. Ñgalñgali 600 S.C.[/i]

1 Siak, Nephi, lapu ed nianak ak ed saray maong ya ateng, kanian nibañgat ak ed amin ya aral nen amak; tan lapu ed anengneng ko so saray dakel a kasegsegañgan legan na saray agew ko, angaman ontan, lapu ed apalaboan ak na Katawan ed amin na saray agew ko; on, awalaan ak na baleg a kakabatan ed kaabigan tan ed misterio na Dios, dia ed ontan gawaen ko so saya a kasulatan na saray agawgawa ed saray agew ko.

2 On, gawaen ko so kasulatan ed salita nen amak, a saya so tugyop na aral na saray Judio tan salita na saray Egipto.

3 Tan kabat ko a saray kasulatan a gawaen ko so tua; tan gawaen ko so saraya ed dili a limak; tan gawaen ko so saraya unong ed kakabatan ko.

4 Tan agawa ed gapo na unaan a taon ed impanoley nen Sedekias, ari na Juda (si amak, a si Lehi, lapu ed nanayam nen saman ed Jerusalem ed amin ya agew to); tan dia ed saman lamlamang a taon dakel so saray sinmabi a profeta, a sikara namprofesiya ed saray totoo a kaukolan a sikara so mambabawi, odino say baleg a ciudad na Jerusalem nepeg a naderal.

5 Lapu ed ontan agawa a si amak, Lehi, dia ed impankurang to nampikasi ed Katawan, on, angan dia ed amin a puso to, ya onkana ed saray totoo to.

6 Tan agawa legan to a mampipikasi ed Katawan, wala so sinmabi a siñga lusek ya apoy tan nanayam ed tapew na sakey a baleg a bato ed arap to; tan anengneng to tan nadñgel to so dakel; tan lapu ed saray beñgatla ya anengneng to tan nadñgel to sikato so pinmayegpeg tan nangiwgiw a mapalalo.

7 Tan agawa a sikato so pinmawil ed dili ya abong to ed Jerusalem; tan sikato so dinmokol ed dukolan to, lapu ed tinalo na Espiritu tan saray beñgatla ya anengneng to.

8 Tan lapu ed tinalo na Espiritu, anengneng to ed payawar, anga ed anengneng to ya alokasan so saray katawenan, tan dia ed nunot to anengneng to so Dios a manyodyurong ed trono to, ya aliber na ag-nabilang ya olop na saray angeles ya awawey da so mañgacancion tan mandadayew ed Dios da.

9 Tan agawa ya anengneng to so Sakey ya onleleksab a nanlapu ed pegley na tawen, tan anengneng to a say sinag to so mapalalo nen say agew ed kaaguan.

10 Tan anengneng to met so sananey a labindua a manomtumbok ed sikato, tan say dalang na sinag da apalabsanan to so dalang na saray bitewen ed liwang.

11 Tan sikara so linmasor a linma ed tapew na dalin; tan say unaan sinmabi tan tinmalindeg ed arapan nen amak, tan initer to so sakey a libro, tan ingangan to ed sikato a basaen to.

12 Tan agawa a dia ed impambasa to, sikato so napno na Espiritu na Katawan.

13 Tan binasa to, a nankuan: Abagey, abagey, so Jerusalem, lapu ed anengneng ko so saray karumsisan mo! On, tan dakel ni a beñgatla so abasa nen amak nipaakar ed Jerusalem—a sikato so kaukolan a naderal, tan saray manaayam diman; dakel so saray ompatey ed panamegley na espada, tan dakel so saray nadakep ya awiten da ya ipañgaw ed loob na Babilonia.

14 Tan agawa a sanen si amak abasa to tan anengneng to so saray ankakabaleg tan makapakelkelaw a beñgatla, imbelyaw to so dakel a beñgatla ed Katawan; a siñga: Ankakabaleg tan makapakelkelaw so saray kimey mo, O Katawan a Dios a Makapanyari ed amin! Say tronom so wala ed tagey na saray katawenan, tan say pakapanyarim tan say kaabigan mo, tan panañgasim so wala ed amin a manaayam ed tapew na dalin; tan, lapu ed mapañgasi ka, ag mo nitepel so saray ondago ed sika a sikara so nabalang!

15 Tan onia so kanengneñgan na salita na impandadayew nen amak ed Dios to; lapu ed say kamarerua to so nangayaga, tan say tibukel a puso to so napno, lapu ed saray beñgatla ya anengneng to, on, saray impanengneng na Katawan ed sikato.

16 Tan natan siak, Nephi, ag ko la dia insulat so saray amin a beñgatla ya insulat nen amak, lapu ed dakel ed saray insulsulat to a saraya so anengneng to ed payawar tan dia ed kugip; tan insulat to met so dakel a beñgatla ya improfesiya to tan sinalita to ed saray ilalak to, a saraya ag ko la isulat dia ya amin.

17 Balet gawaen ko so awaran na saray dinmadalan ya agawgawa legan na saray agew ko. Nia, gawaen ko so pamatikey ed saray kasulatan nen amak, ed tapew na saray piligo a saraya so ginawak ed saray dili a limak; dia ed onia, kayari pamatikey ko ed saray insulat nen amak dia ed ontan gawaen ko met so kasulatan na dili a bilay ko.

18 Dia ed ontan pilalek ko a nakabatan yo, a kayari a say Katawan impanengneng to so saray dakel a makapakelaw a beñgatla ed kinen amak, a Lehi, on, nipaakar ed kaderal na Jerusalem, nia sikato so linma ed limog na saray totoo, tan ginapoan to so namprofesiya tan imbawag to ed sikara so nipaakar ed beñgatla ya anengneng tan nadñgel to.

19 Tan agawa a sikato so binalaw-balaw na saray Judio lapu ed saray beñgatla a pinaneknekan to ed sikara; tan peteg a pinaneknekan to so karelmeñgan nipaakar ed saray karelmeñgan tan karumsisan da; tan pinaneknekan to so saray beñgatla ya anengneng tan nadñgel to, tan ontan met ed saray beñgatla ya abasa to ed libro, a mañgipanengneng a malinlinew nipaakar ed isabi na Mesias, tan ontan met ed pakadundon na mundo.

20 Tan sanen nadñgel na saray Judio so saraya a beñgatla sikara so sinmanok ed sikato; on, angan unong ed saray agawa ed saray profeta nen inmuna, a sikara so imbantak da ed paway, tan tinopak da ra, tan pinatey da ra; tan sikara met so nampilalek ed bilay to, pian saya so naekal da. Balet nia, siak, Nephi, ipanengneng ko ed sikayo a say maamuyot a panañgasi na Katawan wala ed saray pinili to, lapu ed say pananisia ra, a sikara so gawaen to a makapanyari anga ed pakayari na kilalaban.
1-ne 2:
[center][font_size=26]Tekap 2[/font_size][/center]

[i]Si Lehi intarok to so boleg to ed kalawakan a miketeg ed Ambalañga a Dayat—Intilak da so saray kayarian da—Si Lehi initer to so sakey a bagat ed Katawan tan imbañgat to so saray anak to a lalaki ya ontolok ed saray gangan—Si Laman tan si Lemuel so nanñguroñguro sumpa ed ama ra—Si Nephi so maonor tan nampikasi ed pananisia; say Katawan nansalita ed sikato, tan sikato so apili a manoley ed saray agagi to. Ñgalñgali 600 S.C.[/i]

1 Tan nia, agawa a say Katawan nansalita ed kinen amak, on, angan dia ed kugip, tan inkuan to ed sikato: Mapalar ka Lehi, lapu ed saray beñgatla a ginawam; tan lapu ed sika so matuor tan imbawag mo ed saray totoo so saray beñgatla ya ingangan ko ed sika, nia, pampilpilalekan da ya ekalen so bilay mo.

2 Tan agawa a say Katawan ingangan to si amak, angan dia ed kugip, ya alaen to so boleg to tan ontaynan a mamaarap ed kalawakan.

3 Tan agawa a sikato so tinmulok ed saray salita na Katawan, dia ed ontan sinumpal to so unong ed ingangan na Katawan ed sikato.

4 Tan agawa a sikato so sinmipot ya amaarap ed kalawakan. Tan tinaynanan to so abong to, tan dalin a tawir to, tan saray balitok to, tan saray pilak to, tan saray ankabli a beñgatla, tan angapo so intarok to, likud labat ed say boleg to, tan saray tagano, tan abong-abong ya abel, tan sinmipot ira ya ama-arap ed kalawakan.

5 Tan sikato so akasabi ed piketegan ya asinger ed gilig na Ambalañga a Dayat; tan sikato so nanaakar ed kalawakan ed ketegan ya asinger ed Ambalañga a Dayat; tan sikato so manakar ed kalawakan a kaiba to so boleg to, a saray miembro si inak, a Sariah, saray agagik a lalaki a pañguloan, a sikara di Laman, tan Lemuel, tan Sam.

6 Tan agawa a sanen sikato so manaakar ed loob na talora la ya agew ed kalawakan, impaalagey to so abong-abong ya abel ed patar ya asinger ed ilog na danum.

7 Tan agawa a sikato so añgipaalagey na sakey ya altar a bato, tan nangawa na bagat ed Katawan, tan añgiter na pisasalamat ed Katawan a Dios mi.

8 Tan agawa a tinawag to so saman ya ilog, a Laman, tan saya so unaagos ed Ambalañga a Dayat; tan say patar a wala ed ketegan asinger na sañgaban to nia.

9 Tan sanen si amak anengneng to so danum na ilog ya unaagos a papaway ed subol na Ambalañga a Dayat, sikato so nansalita ed si Laman, a nankuan: O manmaliw ka komon a mabiskeg a siñga saya ya ilog, andi-tonda so agos to a mamapaarap ed subol na amin ya inkamatunong!

10 Tan nansalita met ed si Lemuel: O manmaliw ka komon a miolibay ed saya a patar, malet tan ag-nagiing, tan magnayon ya ag nagalaw a mañgonor ed saray gangan na Katawan!

11 Natan sinalita to so saya makaseñgeg ed talker na teñger nen Laman tan si Lemuel; tan nia sikara so ñguroñguro ed dakel a beñgatla sumpa ed kinen ama ra, lapu ed sikato so sakey a too a makanengneng na saray payawar, tan sikara so intagar to ya ompaway ed dalin na Jerusalem, a tinaynan da so saray dalin a tawir da, tan saray balitok da, tan saray pilak da, tan saray ankabli a beñgatla, pian ompatey ira ed kalawakan. Tan saya a pamaakaran so ginawa to lapu ed say makulang-kulang a panagmotektek to ed puso to.

12 Tan onia si Laman tan si Lemuel, lapu ed sikara so sankapañguloanan, sikara so nanñguroñguro sumpa ed si ama ra. Tan sikara so nanñguroñguro lapu ed ag da kabat so pililimog na saman a Dios ya amalsa ed sikara.

13 Ni ag ira manisia a say Jerusalem saman so baleg a ciudad, so nayari a naderal unong ed salita na saray profeta. Tan sikara so kaolibay na saray Judio a wala ed Jerusalem, a nampilalekan da ya ekalen so bilay nen amak.

14 Tan agawa a si amak so nansalita ed sikara dia ed patar na Lemuel, ya awalaan na pakapanyari, lapu ed ikapno na Espiritu, anga ed saray kalamanan da so ginmiwgiw ed arapan to. Tan sikara so binilin to, ya ag da nitepel so mansalita sumpa ed sikato; dia ed ontan, sikara so inmonor unong na ingangan to ed sikara.

15 Tan si amak so nanayam ed abong-abong ya abel.

16 Tan agawa a siak, Nephi, lapu ed mapalalo a malangwer ak ni, angaman ontan lapu ed baleg so laman ko, tan ontan met baleg so pilalek ko a mikabat ed saray misterio na Dios, dia ed ontan, iniakis ko ed Katawan; tan nia dinalaw to ak, tan pinalemek to so pusok kanian manisia ak ed amin a salita ya imbaga nen amak; dia ed ontan, ag ak inmalsa sumpa ed sikato a siñga saray agagik a lalaki.

17 Tan nansalita ak ed si Sam, ya impakabat ko ed sikato so saray beñgatla ya impanengneng na Katawan ed siak ed panamegley na Masanto ya Espiritu. Tan agawa a sikato so anisia ed saray salitak.

18 Balet, nengneng yo, si Laman tan si Lemuel ag da deñgelen so saray salitak; tan lapu ed apaermen ak lapu ed awet na saray puso ra iniakis ko ed Katawan ya onkana ed sikara.

19 Tan agawa a say Katawan so nansalita ed siak, a nankuan: Mapalar ka, Nephi, lapu ed pananisiam, lapu ed inanap mo ak a siseseet, ed mapaabeba a pusom.

20 Tan sano pagnayonen mo ya onoren so saray gangan ko, sika so onaliguas, tan nitunton ka ed dalin a sipan; on, angan sakey a dalin ya imparaan ko ya onkana ed sika; on, sakey a dalin ya apili-pili ed amin a dalin.

21 Tan sano pagnayonen na saray agagim so onalsa ed sika, sikara so nataksing ed arap na Katawan.

22 Tan sano pagnayonen mo ya onoren so saray gangan ko, sika so manmaliw a manañgoley tan bumabañgat ed saray agagim.

23 Tan nia, dia ed saman ya agew ya onalsa ra sumpa ed siak, ayewen ko ra na angan ansakit ya ayew, tan angapo so pakapanyari ra ed saray boleg mo likud no sikara met so onalsa sumpa ed siak.

24 Tan no sikara so onalsa sumpa ed siak, sikara so manmaliw a salot ed saray boleg mo, a sikara so kewkewen da ed saray dalan na pakanodnunotan.
1-ne 3:
[center][font_size=26]Tekap 3[/font_size][/center]

[i]Saray anak a lalaki nen Lehi so pinmawil ed Jerusalem pian alaen da so saray piligo a gansa—Si Laban ag to iter so saray piligo—Si Nephi binilin to tan pinabiskeg to so saray agagi to—Si Laban tinakew to so saray kayarian da tan ginetma to ra a pateyen—Si Laman tan si Lemuel binakbak da si Nephi tan si Sam tan sikara so nampasnokan na sakey ya angel. Ñgalñgali 600–592 S.C.[/i]

1 Tan agawa a siak, Nephi, pinmawil ak a nanlapu ya akisalita ed Katawan, diman ed loob na abong-abong ya abel nen amak.

2 Tan agawa a sikato so nansalita ed siak, a nankuan: Nia nankugip ak na sakey a kugip, a dia ed saya say Katawan ingangan to ak a sika tan saray agagim so ompawil ed Jerusalem.

3 Tan nengneng mo, si Laban wala ed sikato so kasulatan na saray Judio tan say listaan na kapolian na saray inmuna ya atateng ko, tan saraya so nitatak ed saray piligo a gansa.

4 Dia ed ontan, say Katawan ingangan to ak a sika tan saray agagim a lalaki so onla ed abong nen Laban, tan anap yo so saray kasulatan, tan awit yo ra dia ed kalawakan.

5 Tan natan, nengneng mo saray agagim a lalaki sikara so ñguroñguro, a kuan da a sakey a mairap a beñgatla so nakaukolan ko ed sikara; balet nia saya so ag ko kinaukolan ed sikara, balet saya so sakey a gangan na Katawan.

6 Dia ed onia, onla ka anak ko, tan sika so palaboan na Katawan, lapu ed sika so ag nanñguroñguro.

7 Tan agawa a siak, Nephi, inkuan ko ed kinen amak: Onla ak tan gawaen ko so saray beñgatla ya ingangan na Katawan, lapu ed kabat ko a say Katawan ag mañgiter na saray gangan ed saray anak na totoo, likud no sikato so mañgiparaan na dalan ya onkana ed sikara ed panumpal da na beñgatla ya ingangan to ed sikara.

8 Tan agawa a sanen si amak nadñgel to so saraya a salita sikato so mapalalo a maliket, lapu ed kabat to a binendicionan ak na Katawan.

9 Tan siak, Nephi, tan saray agagik so nambaroy ed kalawakan, ya awit mi so saray abong-abong mi ya abel, ya onla ed dalin na Jerusalem.

10 Tan agawa sanen akasabi kami ed dalin na Jerusalem, siak tan saray agagik nankokonuan kami ed balang sinansakey.

11 Tan nambabagotan kami na kapalaran—no siopa ed sikami so onla ed abong nen Laban. Tan agawa say naplagan na kapalaran si Laman; tan si Laman so linma ed abong nen Laban, tan sikato so akitungtong nen akayurong ed dalem na abong to.

12 Tan kinaukolan to ed si Laban so saray kasulatan a nitatak ed piligo a gansa, a dia nilugan so listaan na kapolian nen amak.

13 Tan nengneng yo, agawa a nampasnok si Laban, tan sinunson to a pinapaway ed arapan to; tan ag to labay ya iter so saray kasulatan. Dia ed ontan, inkuan to ed sikato: Nengneng mo sakey ka a matakew, tan sika so pateyen ko.

14 Balet si Laman binmatik a tinmaynan ed kawalaan to, tan imbaga to so saray beñgatla a ginawa nen Laban, ed sikami. Tan ginapoan mi so onermen a mapalalo, tan saray agagik ñgalñgali la ra ompawil ed kinen amak diman ed kalawakan.

15 Balet nia inkuan ko ed sikara ya: Unong a mabilay so Katawan, tan sikatayo ni so mambibilay, ag itayo ompawil ed kinen ama tayo ed kalawakan anga ed nasumpal tayo so beñgatla ya ingangan na Katawan ed sikatayo.

16 Dia ed ontan, nepeg a sikatayo so matuor a manumpal ed saray gangan na Katawan; dia ed onia sikatayo so onla ed kawalaan na dalin a tawir nen ama tayo, tan nia intilak to so saray balitok tan pilak, tan amin a nengneng na kayamanan. Tan saya ya amin so ginawa to lapu ed saray gangan na Katawan.

17 Lapu ed kabat to a say Jerusalem so naderal, makaseñgeg ed inkarelmeng na saray totoo.

18 Tan nia, ag da inawat so salita na saray profeta. Dia ed ontan, no si amak so manayam ed saman a dalin kayari a sikato so nigangan ya ontaynan ed saman a dalin, nia, sikato met so ompatey. Dia ed ontan, nakaukolan a sikato so ontaynan ed saman a dalin.

19 Tan nia, kakabatan ed Dios a nakaukolan a nagamoran tayo so saraya a kasulatan, pian komon magnayon ya onkana ed saray anak mi so salita na saray ama mi;

20 Tan ontan met pian komon magnayon ed sikara so saray salita a nibalikas a nanlapu ed sañgi na saray masanto a profeta, a saraya so niawat ed sikara a nanlapu ed Espiritu tan pakapanyari na Dios, manlapu ed ingapo na mundo, ya anga ed saraya a panaon.

21 Tan agawa ya unong ed saya a pananalita akuyong ko so saray agagik, pian manmaliw ira komon a matuor ed panumpal ed saray gangan na Dios.

22 Tan agawa a sikami so linma ed dalin a tawir mi, tan tinipon mi so saray balitok mi, tan pilak mi, tan saray ankabli a beñgatla ed sikami.

23 Tan kayari mi a tinipon so saraya a beñgatla, linma kami lamet ed abong nen Laban.

24 Tan agawa a sikami so linma ed kinen Laban, tan kinaukolan mi ed sikato ya iter to ed sikami so saray kasulatan a saraya so nitatak ed piligo a gansa, dia ed onia iter mi ed sikato so saray balitok mi, tan pilak mi, tan amin ya ankabli a beñgatla ed sikami.

25 Tan agawa a sanen anengneng nen Laban so saray kayarian mi, tan saraya so mapalalo a dakel, sinmabi ibeg to ed saraya, a lapu ed saya sikami so sinunson to a pinapaway tan imbaki to so saray igagangan to a mamatey ed sikami, pian komon nagamoran to so saray kayarian mi.

26 Tan agawa a sikami so binmatik ed arap na saray igagangan nen Laban, tan apasuotan kami ya intilak mi so saray kayarian mi, tan saraya so naplag ed saray lima nen Laban.

27 Tan agawa a sikami so binmatik ed kalawakan, tan ag kami la naabot na saray igagangan nen Laban, tan sikami so inmamot ed uñgib na sakey a baleg a bato.

28 Tan agawa a si Laman nampasnok ed siak, tan ontan met ed kinen amak; tan ontan met si Lemuel, lapu ed dineñgel to so saray salita nen Laman. Dia ed ontan si Laman tan si Lemuel so nansalita ra na saray ansakit a salita ed sikami, a malangwer ya agagi da a lalaki, tan sikami so binakbak da na sakey a baston.

29 Tan agawa a sanen binakbak da kami na sakey a baston, bigla, sakey ya angel na Katawan so sinmabi tan tinmalindeg ed arap da, a nansalita ed sikara; a kuan to: Akin kasi bakbaken yo so malangwer ya agi yo a laki na sakey a baston? Ag yo kasi kabat a say Katawan sikato so pinili to a manañgoley ed sikayo, tan saya lapu ed saray karelmeñgan yo? Deñgel yo onla kayo lamet ed Jerusalem, tan say Katawan iawat to si Laban ed saray lima yo.

30 Tan kayari a nansalita so angel ed sikami, sikato so tinmaynan.

31 Tan kayari a say angel so tinmaynan, si Laman tan si Lemuel ginapoan da lamet so manñguroñguro, ya inkuan da: Panon a say Katawan iawat to si Laban ed saray lima tayo? Nengneng yo, sikato so sakey a mabiskeg a too, tan nayarian to ya igangan so limamplo, on, angan sarag to a pateyen so limamplo; dia ed ontan akin ya ag pati sikatayo?
1-ne 4:
[center][font_size=26]Tekap 4[/font_size][/center]

[i]Si Nephi pinatey to si Laban dia ed gangan na Katawan tan nala to so saray piligo a gansa ed panamegley na silib—Si Zoram pinili to so miolop ed boleg nen Lehi ed kalawakan. Ñgalñgali 600–592 S.C.[/i]

1 Tan agawa a nansalita ak ed saray agagik, ya inkuan ko: Onla tayo lamet ya ontakdang ed Jerusalem, tan matuor itayo ed panumpal ed saray gangan na Katawan; tan nia sikato so mabiskeg nen say amin dia ed dalin, iñgen mabiskeg nen si Laban tan saray limamplo to, on, odino angan say samplo a libo to?

2 Dia ed onia onla tayo ya ontakdang; kaukolan sikatayo so mabiskeg a siñga si Moises; lapu ed tua a nansalita ed saray danum na Ambalañga a Dayat tan abelsay dia tan diman, tan saray ama tayo dinmalan ira, a pinmaway ed inkadakep, ed amaga a dalin, tan saray ñgayew nen Paraon a tinmumbok tan sikara so nalner ed danum na Ambalañga a Dayat.

3 Natan nengneng yo a saya kabat yo saya so tua; tan kabat yo met a sakey ya angel so nansalita ed sikayo; dia ed onia sikayo ni kasi so manduarua? Onla tayo ya ontakdang; say Katawan sarag to ya ilaban to tayo, angan siñga saray ama tayo, tan deralen to si Laban, angan siñga saray taga-Egipto.

4 Natan nen imbalikas ko so saraya a salita, sansia ni so pasnok da, tan nampatuloy ni ra a nanñguroñguro; angaman ontan sikara so tinmumbok ed siak anga ed akasabi kami ed paway na padir na Jerusalem.

5 Tan labi ed saman; tan pinaamot ko ra ed paway na padir. Tan kayari ra ya iniamot so inkasikara, siak, Nephi, linmoob ak a maamot ed ciudad tan linma ak ya amaarap ed abong nen Laban.

6 Tan intunton ak na Espiritu, a dia ed sakbay to nia ag ko ni kabat so saray beñgatla a gawaen ko.

7 Angaman ontan linma ak, tan sanen wala ak la ed asinger na abong nen Laban akanengneng ak na sakey a too, tan sikato so alopbob ed dalin dia ed arapan ko, lapu ed sikato so abuek na alak.

8 Tan sanen inasingeran ko nalmok a sikato si Laban.

9 Tan anengneng ko so espada to, tan saya so inoyus ko a nanlapu ed kaloban to nia; tan say putan to nia so puro a balitok, tan say inkagawa to mapalalo a marakep, tan anengneng ko a say tarem to nia agawa a nanlapu ed atagey ya uri na asiro.

10 Tan agawa a say Espiritu piliten to ak a mamatey ed si Laban, balet inkuan ko ed pusok: kapiganman ed anto a panaon ag ko amaterter na dala na too. Tan masuknar so liknaan ko pian komon sikato so ag ko pateyen.

11 Tan say Espiritu inkuan to lamet ed siak: Nia say Katawan sikato so añgiawat ed saray limam. On, tan kabat ko met a pilalek to ya ekalen so dili a bilay ko; on, tan ag to ondeñgel ed saray gangan na Katawan; tan sinamsam to met so saray kayarian mi.

12 Tan agawa a say Espiritu inkuan to lamet ed siak: Patey mo, lapu ed say Katawan so añgiawat ed saray limam;

13 Nia say Katawan pateyen to so saray totoo a marelmeng pian iparungtal to so saray matunong a gagala to. Magmaong ni a say sakey a too so ompatey nen say sakey a bansa so onlasay tan ompatey ed ag-pananisia.

14 Tan natan, sanen siak, Nephi, nadñgel ko so saraya a salita, anunotan ko so saray salita na Katawan a sinalita to ed siak diman ed kalawakan, a nankuan: Dapot no saray boleg mo sumpalen da so saray gangan ko, sikara so onaliguas ed dalin a sipan.

15 On, tan anunotan ko met ya ag da nayarian a sumpalen so saray gangan na Katawan unong ed gangan nen Moises, likud no wala ed sikara so gangan.

16 Tan kabat ko met a say gangan nitatak ed saray piligo a gansa.

17 Tan lamet, kabat ko a say Katawan iniawat to si Laban ed saray limak ed saya a pamaakaran—pian nagamoran ko so saray kasulatan unong ed gangan to.

18 Dia ed ontan, inonor ko so voces na Espiritu, tan binembenan ko si Laban ed buek na ulo to, tan pinotot ko so ulo to ed dili ya espada to.

19 Tan kayarik a pinotot so ulo to ed dili a espada to, nilakseb ko so kawes nen Laban, tan insulong ko ed dili a laman ko; on, angan sankamelagan a beñgatla; tan imbalkes ko so saray kirlong to ed awak ko.

20 Tan kayari a ginawak so saya, linma ak ed panañginan na kayamanan nen Laban. Tan legan a mamapaarap ak ed panañginan na kayamanan nen Laban, nia, anengneng ko so igagangan nen Laban a sikato so kawalaan na tumbok na panañginan na kayamanan. Tan ingangan ko ed sikato ed kaolibay na voces nen Laban, a sikato so mila ed siak ed dalem na panañginan na kayamanan.

21 Tan impasen to a siak so katawan to, a si Laban, lapu ed amuria to so saray kawes tan ontan met ed espada ya akabalkes ed awak ko.

22 Tan sikato so nansalita ed siak nipaakar ed saray mamasiken na saray Judio, lapu ed kabat to a si katawan to, si Laban, so pinmaway nen labi ya akilimog ed sikara.

23 Tan nansalita ak ed sikato a siñga siak si Laban.

24 Tan nansalita ak met ed sikato a libiten ko so saray nitatak ed piligo a gansa, ed saray papañguloan ya agagik, a wala ed paway na padir.

25 Tan sikato so kinaukolan ko ya ontumbok ed siak.

26 Tan lapu ed sikato, impasen to a say sasalitaen ko saray kaagian ed simbaan, tan siak a peteg si Laban a sikato so pinatey ko, dia ed ontan sikato so tinmumbok ed siak.

27 Tan sikato so nansalita ed siak ya amimpiga-piga nipaakar ed saray mamasiken na saray Judio, legan ya ompapawil ak la ed saray agagik, a sikara so wala ed paway na padir.

28 Tan agawa a sanen si Laman anengneng to ak ataktakot a maong, tan ontan met nen Lemuel tan si Sam. Tan batik ira ya ontaynan ed arapan ko; lapu ed impasen da a siak a si Laban, tan pinatey to ak tan aanapen to ra a pateyen met.

29 Tan agawa, a tinawag ko ra, tan nadñgel da ak; dia ed ontan tinmoda ra ed imbabatik da ya ontaynan ed arapan ko.

30 Tan agawa a sanen say igagangan nen Laban anengneng to so saray agagik sikato so ginmapo ya ongiwgiw, tan ombatik lawari ya ontaynan ed arapan ko tan ompawil la ed ciudad na Jerusalem.

31 Tan natan siak, Nephi, lapu ed siak so too a baleg ed impanlaman, tan lapu ed inawat ko met so mapalalo a biskeg na Katawan, dia ed onia tinekmelan ko so igagangan nen Laban, tan binembenan ko, pian ag makabatik.

32 Tan agawa a nansalita ak ed sikato, a no deñgelen to so saray salitak, unong a say Katawan so mabilay, tan mabilay ak, ontan met no deñgelen to so saray salita mi, iligyas mi so bilay to.

33 Tan nansalita ak ed sikato, a katekep na samba, ya ag nakaukolan a sikato so ontakot; a sikato so manmaliw a too a walaan na kawayañgan a siñga sikami no sikato so miolop ed sikami ya onleksab ed kalawakan.

34 Tan nansalita ak met ed sikato, a nankuan: Peteg a say Katawan ingangan to ed sikami so saraya a beñgatla; tan ag mi kasi panseetan a sumpalen so saray gangan na Katawan? Dia ed onia, no onleksab ka ed kalawakan ed kinen amak nawalaan ka na pasen ed sikami.

35 Tan agawa a si Zoram apabiskeg so linawa to lapu ed saray salita ya imbalikas ko. Natan Zoram so ñgaran na saya ya igagangan; tan insipan to ya onleksab ed kalawakan ed kinen ama mi. On, sikato so nansamba met ed sikami a miayam ed sikami manlapu ed saman a panaon.

36 Natan pilalek mi a sikato so miayam ed sikami makaseñgeg ed saya a pamaakaran, pian saray Judio ag da komon nakabatan so intaynan mi a linma ed kalawakan, ag la piga a sikara so onosil tan deralen da kami.

37 Tan agawa a sanen si Zoram so nangawa na samba ed sikami, say takot mi so tinmonda nipaakar ed sikato.

38 Tan agawa ya inala mi so saray piligo a gansa tan say igagangan nen Laban, tan tinmaynan kami ya amaarap ed kalawakan, tan nambaroy kami anga ed kawalaan na abong-abong ya abel nen amak.
1-ne 5:
[center][font_size=26]Tekap 5[/font_size][/center]

[i]Si Sariah nandalem sumpa ed si Lehi—Sikara a dua so nangayaga ed impawil na saray anak da a lalaki—Sikara so añgisaklang na saray bagat—Saray piligo a gansa lugan to so saray kasulatan nen Moises tan saray profeta—Dia ed saray piligo abirbir a si Lehi so kapolian nen Jose—Si Lehi so namprofesiya nipaakar ed boleg to tan say kiagel na saray piligo. Ñgalñgali 600–592 S.C.[/i]

1 Tan agawa a kayari mi ya amaarap ed kalawakan a kawalaan nen amak, nia, sikato so napno na gayaga, tan ontan met nen inak, a si Sariah, mapalalo so liket to, lapu ed sikato so peteg a nanermen makaseñgeg ed sikami.

2 Lapu ed impasen to ya inatey kami la ed kalawakan; tan sikato met so nandalem sumpa ed si amak, ya ibabaga to ed sikato a sikato so sakey a too a makanengneng na saray payawar; ya inkuan to: Nengneng mo sika so añgiwanwan ed sikami a nanlapu ed dalin a tawir tayo, tan saray anak ko a lalaki angapo la ra, tan ompatey tayo ed kalawakan.

3 Tan dia ed onia a nengneng na salita so impandalem nen inak sumpa ed kinen amak.

4 Tan agawa a si amak so nansalita ed sikato, a nankuan: Kabat ko a sakey ak a too a makanengneng ed saray payawar; tan no ag ko anengneng so saray beñgatla a nipaakar ed Dios ed sakey a payawar ag ko komon akabatan so kamaoñgan nipaakar ed Dios, balet no nanayam ak ed Jerusalem, tan inatey ak met a kaiba na saray kaagian ko.

5 Balet nengneng yo, agamoran ko so dalin a sipan, a nipaakar ed saraya a beñgatla siak so nangayaga; on, tan kabat ko a say Katawan ilaban to so saray anak ko ed saray lima nen Laban, tan awiten da ra lamet ed sikatayo dia ed kalawakan.

6 Tan dia ed onia a nengneng na salita nen amak, a si Lehi, aligliwa si inak, a Sariah, nipaakar ed sikami, legan a nambaroy kami ed kalawakan a mamaarap ed dalin na Jerusalem, pian nagamoran mi so kasulatan na saray Judio.

7 Tan sanen akapawil kami ed abong-abong ya abel nen amak, nengneng yo say gayaga ra so napno, tan si inak so aligliwa.

8 Tan sikato so nansalita, a nankuan: Natan kabat ko a peteg a say Katawan ingangan to so asawak ya ontaynan ya onla ed kalawakan; on, tan kabat ko met a peteg a say Katawan iniagel to so saray anak ko a lalaki, tan inlaban to ra ed saray lima nen Laban, tan initer to ed sikara so pakapanyari a pakasumpal ed beñgatla ya ingangan na Katawan ed sikara. Tan dia ed onia a nengneng na salita sikato so nambalikas.

9 Tan agawa a nangayaga ra a mapalalo, tan añgisaklang ira na bagat tan pinoolan a bagat ed Katawan; tan akisalamat ira ed Dios na Israel.

10 Tan kayari ra ya añgiter na pisasalamat ed Dios na Israel, si amak, a Lehi, inala to so saray kasulatan ya akatatak ed piligo a gansa, tan sinukayan to a nanlapu ed gapo.

11 Tan amuria to a nilugan diman so saray limara a libro nen Moises, ya añgiter na kasulatan na inkapalsa na mundo, tan ontan met ed si Adan tan si Eva, a sikara so unaan ya ateng tayo;

12 Tan ontan met ed kasulatan na saray Judio a manlapu ed gapo, ya anga ed ingapo na oley nen Sedekias, ari na Juda;

13 Tan ontan met ed saray profesiya na saray masanto a profeta, a manlapu ed gapo, ya anga ed ingapo na oley nen Sedekias; tan ontan met ed saray dakel a profesiya a sinalita ed panamegley na sañgi nen Jeremias.

14 Tan agawa a si amak, a si Lehi, arumog to met ed saray piligo a gansa so listaan na kapolian na saray kaamaan to; dia ed ontan akabatan to a sikato so sakey a kapolian nen Jose; salanti, si Jose a sikato so anak nen Jacob, a sikato so inlako ed Egipto, tan sikato so iniagel na lima na Katawan, pian sikato so mañgiagel komon ed si ama to, ya Jacob, tan amin a kabobung to ed ipatey da makaseñgeg ed eras.

15 Tan sikara met so inukbar to ed inkadakep tan pinmaway ira ed dalin na Egipto, na saman lamlamang a Dios ya añgiagel ed sikara.

16 Tan onia si amak, a si Lehi, nalmo to so listaaan na kapolian na saray kaamaan to. Tan si Laban so sakey met a kapolian nen Jose, dia ed ontan sikato tan saray kaamaan to so añgisinop ed say kasulatan.

17 Tan natan sanen si amak anengneng to so saraya a beñgatla, sikato so napno na Espiritu, tan ginmapo a mamprofesiya nipaakar ed saray boleg to—

18 A saraya a piligo a gansa so makadateng ed amin a bansa, sankakanayon, salita, tan totoo a nanlapu ed boleg to.

19 Dia ed ontan, inkuan to a saraya a piligo a gansa so magnayon ya ag naderal; ni say pakuyepen na panaon. Tan sikato so namprofesiya na dakel a beñgatla nipaakar ed boleg to.

20 Tan agawa ya onia a siak tan si amak sinumpal mi so saray gangan unong ed ingangan na Katawan ed sikami.

21 Tan agamoran mi so saray kasulatan ya ingangan na Katawan ed sikami, tan sinokait mi so saraya tan nalmo mi a saraya so pampilalekan; on, angan ed baleg a kakanaan ed sikami, pian pagnayonen mi so saray gangan na Katawan ed saray anak mi.

22 Dia ed ontan, sakey a karonuñgan ed Katawan a nepeg mi ya awiten iraya ed inkasikami, legan a nambaroy kami ed kalawakan ya onarap ed dalin na sipan.
1-ne 6:
[center][font_size=26]Tekap 6[/font_size][/center]

[i]Si Nephi insulat to so saray beñgatla a nipaakar ed Dios—Say gagala nen Nephi so mankuyong na saray totoo ya ondago ed Dios nen Abraham tan sikara so nilaban. Ñgalñgali 600–592 S.C.[/i]

1 Tan natan siak, Nephi, ag ko dia iter so listaan na kapolian na saray kaamaan ko ed saya a kabiañgan na kasulatan ko; odino dia ed antokaman a panaon iter ko so saya ed saraya a piligo ya isosulat ko; lapu ed niiter la ed kasulatan ya insinop nen amak; dia ed ontan, ag ko la isulat ed saya a kimey.

2 Lapu ed magenap la ed siak so pañgikuan ko a sikami so kapolian nen Jose.

3 Tan ag la makana ya idalatdat ko ya amin so awaran na saray beñgatla nipaakar ed si amak, lapu ed saraya so ag la naisulat ed saraya a piligo, lapu ed pilalek ko a wala so pasen komon ya isulat ko ed saray beñgatla ed Dios.

4 Lapu ed say pakagnap na dili a gagalak say pakakuyong ko komon ed saray totoo ya ondago ed Dios nen Abraham, tan say Dios nen Isaac, tan say Dios nen Jacob, tan sikara so nilaban.

5 Dia ed ontan, saray beñgatla a makapaliket ed mundo ag ko isulat, no ag iñgen saray beñgatla a makapaliket ed Dios tan nipaakar ed saray aliwa a taga dia ed saya a mundo.

6 Dia ed ontan, iter ko so gangan ed saray boleg ko, ya ag da ilugan ed saraya a piligo so saray beñgatla ya aliwa a manepeg ed saray anak na totoo.
1-ne 7:
[center][font_size=26]Tekap 7[/font_size][/center]

[i]Saray anak a lalaki nen Lehi sikara so pinmawil ed Jerusalem tan binagaan da si Ishmael tan saray kabobung to a mila ed say baroy da—Si Laman tan saray arum inmalsa ra—Si Nephi akikasi ed saray agagi to a nawalaan ira na pananisia ed Katawan—Sikato so binalor da na lubir tan implano ra so kaderal to—Sikato so akablos ed panamegley na pakapanyari na pananisia—Saray agagi to so kinmerew na pirdona—Si Lehi tan saray kaolop to so añgisaklang na bagat tan nampool ira na bagat. Ñgalñgali 600–592 S.C.[/i]

1 Tan natan pilalek ko a nakabatan yo komon, a kasumpal a si amak, a si Lehi, sinampotan to la so pamprofesiya to nipaakar ed boleg to, agawa a say Katawan nansalita ed sikato lamet, ya inkuan to ya ag manepeg ed sikato, si Lehi, ya awiten to so boleg to ed kalawakan a mambokbukor; balet a saray lalaki ya anak to so nepeg a mañgala ra na anak a bibii ya asawaen da, pian komon naparakel da so boleg da ed Katawan diman ed dalin a sipan.

2 Tan agawa a say Katawan ingangan to ed sikato a siak, Nephi, tan saray agagik, ya ompawil kami lamet ed dalin na Jerusalem, tan awiten mi si Ishmael tan say boleg to dia ed kalawakan.

3 Tan agawa a siak, Nephi, lamet, kaibak so saray agagik, bineltang mi so kalawakan a mamaarap ed Jerusalem.

4 Tan agawa a linma kami ed abong nen Ishmael, tan agamoran mi so maabig ed arap nen Ishmael, makaseñgeg a sinalita mi ed sikato so saray salita na Katawan.

5 Tan agawa a say Katawan pinalemek to so puso nen Ishmael, tan ontan met saray kabobung to, kanian akiolop ira ed sikami a nambaroy ya amaarap ed kalawakan ya ompugta ed abong-abong ya abel nen ama mi.

6 Tan agawa a legan mi a mambabaroy ed kalawakan, nia si Laman tan si Lemuel, tan duara ed saray anak a bibii nen Ishmael, tan duara ed saray anak a lalaki nen Ishmael tan saray boleg da, so inmalsa sumpa ed sikami; on, sumpa ed siak, Nephi, tan si Sam, tan si ama ra, a si Ishmael, tan say asawa to, tan saraman so arum a talora ya anak to a bibii.

7 Tan agawa a dia ed saman a gulo, pilalek da la so ompawil ed dalin na Jerusalem.

8 Tan natan siak, Nephi, lapu ed apaermen ak ed awet na saray puso ra, dia ed onia nansalita ak ed sikara, a nankuan, on, angan dia ed kinen Laman tan si Lemuel: Nia, sikayo so papañguloan ya agagik, tan panon ya ontan la so awet na kapusoan yo, tan mapalalo so inkabulag na kanunotan yo, a nakaukolan ni a siak, a malangwer ya agi yo, so mansalita ed sikayo, on, tan mañgipasen na pañgaligan yo?

9 Panon a sikayo so ag dinmeñgel ed salita na Katawan?

10 Panon a sikayo so akalingwan a sikayo so akanengneng na angel na Katawan?

11 On, tan panon a sikayo so akalingwan ed saray ankakabaleg a beñgatla a ginawa na Katawan ed sikatayo, ed impañgilaban to ed sikatayo ed lima nen Laban, tan ontan met pian nagamoran tayo so kasulatan?

12 On, tan panon a sikayo so akalingwan a say Katawan nayarian to a gawaen so amin a beñgatla unong ed linawa to, ya onkana ed saray anak na totoo, no agamilen da so pananisia ed sikato? Dia ed onia, sikatayo so mansiansia ed sikato.

13 Tan no matolok itayo ed sikato, nagamoran tayo so dalin na sipan; tan nakabatan yo ed saray arapen a panaon a say salita na Katawan nasumpal nipaakar ed kaderal na Jerusalem; lapu ed amin a beñgatla a sinalita na Katawan nipaakar ed kaderal na Jerusalem so andi-saew a nasumpal.

14 Petepeteg, say Espiritu na Katawan ag mambayag so piayam to ed sikara; makapaermen, ag da inawat so saray profeta, tan si Jeremias imbantak da ed pañgawan. Tan nampilalekan da ya ekalen so bilay nen amak, ya akaseñgeg na impanagdag da ed sikato ed paway na saman a dalin.

15 Natan nia, ikuan ko ed sikayo no ompawil kayo ed Jerusalem pati sikayo met so ompatey a siñga sikara. Tan natan, no wala so pampilian yo, onla kayo ed saman a dalin, tan nunoten yo so saray sinalitak ed sikayo, no onla kayo ompatey kayo met; lapu ed onia say Espiritu na Katawan pipiliten to ak pian mansalita ed sikayo.

16 Tan agawa a sanen siak, Nephi, nibalikas ko so saraya a salita ed saray agagik, nampasnok ira ed siak. Tan agawa a nilimaan da ak, tan nia, mapalalo so pasnok da, tan binalor da ak na lubir, a nampilalekan da ya ekalen so bilay ko, pian taynan da ak ed kalawakan a kanen na saray monanakap.

17 Balet agawa a nampikasi ak ed Katawan, a nankuan: O Katawan, unong ed pananisiak a wala ed sika, ilaban mo ak ed lima na saray agagik; on, angan iter mo ed siak so biskeg pian napaksot ko so saraya a lubir ya akabalor ed siak.

18 Tan agawa a sanen nibesñgaw ko so saraya a salita, nia, say taker naokbar ed saray limak tan saray salik, tan tinmalindeg ak ed arapan na saray agagik, tan nansalita ak lamet ed sikara.

19 Tan agawa a nampasnok ira ed siak lamet, tan labay da ak a limaan; balet nia, sakey ed saray bibii ya anak nen Ishmael, on, tan si ina to met, tan sakey ed saray anak a lalaki nen Ishmael, so akikasi ed saray agagik, makaseñgeg ya apalemek da so puso ra; tan sikara so tinmoda ed pilalek da ya ekalen so bilay ko.

20 Tan agawa a nanermen ira, lapu ed saray karelmeñgan da, ya asabi ni a tinmewek ira ed arap ko, tan kinerew da a pirdonaen ko ra ed saray beñgatla a ginawa ra sumpa ed siak.

21 Tan agawa a dia ed arap-arapan pinirdonak ira ed saray ginawa ra, tan imbagak ed sikara a mampikasi ra ed Katawan a Dios da ya onkerew na pirdona. Tan agawa a saya so sinumpal da. Tan kayari ra a nampikasi ed Katawan intuloy mi lamet so nambaroy ya amaarap ed abong-abong ya abel nen amak.

22 Tan agawa ya akasabi kami ed abong-abong ya abel nen amak. Tan kayari a siak tan saray agagik tan amin ya kabobung nen Ishmael so akasabi ed abong-abong ya abel nen amak, sikara so añgiter na pisasalamat ed Katawan a Dios da; tan añgisaklang ira na bagat tan pinoolan a bagat ed sikato.
1-ne 8:
[center][font_size=26]Tekap 8[/font_size][/center]

[i]Si Lehi anengneng to ed payawar so sakey a kiew na bilay—Sikato so akinabang ed buñga to tan nampilalek a say boleg to onalig ira—Anengneng to so tibukel a balatyang, sakey a maptek tan makisir a dalan, tan say kelpa na biluñget a sinmuklob ed totoo—Si Sariah, si Nephi, tan si Sam so akinabang na buñga, balet si Laman tan si Lemuel ag da inawat. Ñgalñgali 600–592 S.C.[/i]

1 Tan agawa a tinipon mi so amin a nengneng na bokel unong ed inkapalsa to, mandapag a nengneng na dawa, tan ontan met na saray bokel na buñga.

2 Tan agawa a legan nen amak a manaayam ed kalawakan nansalita ed sikami, a nankuan: Nia, siak so nankugip na sakey a kugip; odino dia ed sananey a salita, akanengneng ak na sakey a payawar.

3 Tan nengneng yo, lapu ed saray beñgatla ya anengneng ko, wala so pankatunoñgan ko a mangayaga ed Katawan lapu ed si Nephi tan ontan met ed si Sam; lapu ed wala so pankatunoñgan ko a mañgipasen a sikara, tan ontan met dakel ed saray boleg da, so nilaban.

4 Balet nia, Laman tan Lemuel, mapaga ak a maong ed sikayo; tan nengneng yo, dia ed kanunotan ko anengneng ko ed kugip ko, so ambiluñget tan maermen a kalawakan.

5 Tan agawa ya anengneng ko so sakey a too, tan sikato so akakawes na amputi a kolibemben; tan sikato so dinmago tan inmalagey ed arapan ko.

6 Tan agawa a sikato so nansalita ed siak, tan ginangan to ak ya ontumbok ed sikato.

7 Tan agawa a dia ed intumbok ko ed sikato anengneng ko so inkasiak a wala ak ed ambiluñget tan maermen a lawak.

8 Tan kayarik a nambaroy ed dakel ya oras ed kabiluñgetan, ginapoan ko so mampikasi ed Katawan a kasian to ak, unong ed kinarakel na maolimek a panañgasi to.

9 Tan agawa a kayarik a nampikasi ed Katawan anengneng ko so baleg tan maawang a patar.

10 Tan agawa ya anengneng ko so sakey a kiew, a say buñga to makaayat a mamaliket ed siopaman.

11 Tan agawa a linma ak ya inmasinger tan añgan ak na buñga to nia; tan atawayan ko a sankasamitan, ed amin na saray atawayan ko la. On, tan anengneng ko a say buñga to nia so amputi tan apalabsanan to so puti na saray anengneng ko la.

12 Tan dia ed impañgan ko ed saman a buñga pinano to so kamareruak na mapalalo a gayaga; dia ed ontan, ginapoan ko so mampilalek a say boleg ko so mañgan met ira; lapu ed kabat ko a saya so makaayat ed amin a buñga.

13 Tan sanen inwandag ko so matak ed kaliber-liber, ag la piga no narumog ko met so boleg ko, anengneng ko so sakey ya ilog na danum; tan saya so managagos, tan asinger ed pasen na kiew a pañgakanan ko na buñga.

14 Tan ninengneng ko no iner so panlalapuan to; tan anengneng ko so ulo to ed ag arawi; tan dia ed uloan to anengneng ko si ina yo a Sariah, tan si Sam, tan si Nephi; tan akaalagey ira a siñga ag da amta no iner so laen da.

15 Tan agawa a sikara so kinaweyan ko; tan inkuan ko met ed sikara ed maksil a voces ya ondago ra ed siak, tan mañgan ira na buñga, a saya so makaayat ed amin a buñga.

16 Tan agawa a sikara so dinmago ed siak tan añgan met ira na buñga.

17 Tan agawa a pilalek ko a si Laman tan si Lemuel so ondago pian mañgan met ira na buñga; dia ed ontan inwandag ko so saray matak ed uloan na ilog, ag la piga no nanengneng ko ra.

18 Tan agawa ya anengneng ko ra, balet ag ira ondago ed siak tan ag ira mañgan na buñga.

19 Tan anengneng ko so sakey a tibukel a balatyang, tan saya so manlapu ed pandel na ilog, tan ompugta ed kiew a panalalageyan ko.

20 Tan anengneng ko met so sakey a maiñget tan makisir a dalan, a saya so akiolop ed tibukel a balatyang, ya angan ongawat ed kiew a panalalageyan ko; tan saya so ompugta met ed ulo na subol, dia ed baleg tan maawang a patar, a siñga saman so sakey a mundo.

21 Tan anengneng ko so ag-nabilang ya olop na totoo, a say karaklan manleletletan ira a makaasinger, pian komon nagamoran da so dalan ya ompugta ed kiew a panalalageyan ko.

22 Tan agawa ya akasabi ra tan ginapoan da a tuntonen so dalan a mamaarap ed kiew.

23 Tan agawa a linmetaw so sakey a kelpa na biluñget; on, angan mapalalo a kelpa na biluñget, a makaseñgeg saraman so ginmapo ya ontunton ed dalan sikara so abalang, kanian nanakar-akar ira tan sikara so abalang.

24 Tan agawa ya anengneng ko so arum a manleletletan pian makagamor, tan sikara so akaasinger tan akapeket ira ed sampot na tibukel a balatyang; tan sikara so nampatuloy ya onasinger ed pegley na kelpa na biluñget, ya akapeket ira ed tibukel a balatyang, angan dia ed impakasabi ra tan akapañgan ira ed buñga na kiew.

25 Tan kayari ra ya añgan ed buñga na kiew inwandag da so saray mata ra ed kaliber-liber a siñga nababaiñgan ira.

26 Tan inwandag ko met so saray matak ed kaliber-liber, tan amuriak, ed biek pandel na ilog na danum, so sakey a baleg tan maawaawang a paalagey; tan saya akatalindeg a siñga wala ed dagem, ed tagey na dalin.

27 Tan saya so napno na totoo, mandapag a matakken tan ogaw; mandapag a laki tan bii; tan say indeñgan na panañgawes da so mapalalo a marakep, tan say awawey da so mambabalaw tan mañgitoturo na tamoro ra ed saraman so inmasinger tan mañgaakan na buñga.

28 Tan kayari ra ya atawayan so buñga sikara so nababaiñgan, lapu ed saraman so manmodmura ed sikara; tan sikara so naplag ya inmarawi ed nisebel a dalan tan sikara so abalang.

29 Tan natan siak, Nephi, ag ko la salitaen ya amin so saray sinalita nen amak.

30 Balet, pian antikey la so pansulat, nia, anengneng to so sananey a karaklan a manleletletan pian makagamor; tan sikara so akasabi tan abembenan da so sampot na tibukel a balatyang; tan pinilit da so onletlet, ya andi-tonda so peket da ed tibukel a balatyang, anga ed sikara so akasabi tan tinmalimukor ira ya añgan ed buñga na kiew.

31 Tan sikato so akanengneng met na sananey a karaklan a babasbasen da so mamapaarap ed kawalaan na baleg tan maawang a paalagey.

32 Tan agawa a dakel so nalner ed kaaraleman na subol; tan dakel so abalang ed pakanengneng to, a nanakar-akar ed ag-kabkabat a dalan.

33 Tan baleg so olop na saray karaklan a linmoob ed saman so ag-kabkabat a paalagey. Tan kayari inloob da ed saman a paalagey sikara so añgituro na tamoro ra a mamabalaw ed siak tan ed saraman so mañgaakan met na buñga; balet ag mi ra dinerleng.

34 Saraya so salita nen amak: Tan no kaonoñgan so dinmeñgel ed sikara, sinmian ira.

35 Tan si Laman tan si Lemuel ag akapañgan ed buñga na kiew, inkuan nen amak.

36 Tan agawa a kayari ya imbalikas nen amak so amin a salita ed kugip to odino payawar, a saraya so dakel, inkuan to ed sikami, lapu ed saraya a beñgatla ya anengneng ko ed payawar, mapalalo so pagak ed si Laman tan si Lemuel; on, natatakot ak ompano sikara so nibantak a niarawi ed arap na Katawan.

37 Tan impikasi to ed sikara ed amin a liknaan na sakey a maolimek ya ateng, pian deñgelen da komon so saray salita to, ag la piga say Katawan nakasian to ra, tan ag to ra ibantak ed paway; on, si amak so nampulong ed sikara.

38 Tan kayari to a nampulong ed sikara, tan improfesiya to met ed sikara so dakel a beñgatla, kinerew to ed sikara ya onoren da so saray gangan na Katawan; tan intonda to so pansasalita to ed sikara.
1-ne 9:
[center][font_size=26]Tekap 9[/font_size][/center]

[i]Si Nephi nangawa na duara a tugyop na kasulatan—Balang sakey so atawag a piligo nen Nephi—Say babaleg a piligo lugan to so minomundo ya awaran; say memelag so mañgibabaga na saray sagrado a beñgatla. Ñgalñgali 600–592 S.C.[/i]

1 Tan amin a saraya a beñgatla si amak anengneng to, tan nadñgel to, tan sinalita to, legan na impanayam to ed abong-abong ya abel, dia ed patar na Lemuel, tan ontan met ed dakel ira a baleg a beñgatla, ya ag la nayari ya isulat ed saraya a piligo.

2 Tan natan, unong ed asalitak la nipaakar ed saraya a piligo, nia aliwa ed saraya a piligo so pangawaan ko na nagnap a kasulatan na awaran na saray totook; lapu ed saray piligo a pangawaan ko na nagnap a kasulatan nipaakar ed saray totook so inñgaran ko na Nephi; dia ed ontan saraya so atawag a piligo nen Nephi, ya intumbok ed ñgaran ko; tan saraya a piligo so atawag met a piligo nen Nephi.

3 Angaman ontan, inawat ko so sakey a gangan na Katawan a gawaen ko so saraya a piligo, ya onkana ed niduma a gagala pian wala so kasulatan a nitatak nipaakar ed impanoley na saray totook.

4 Dia ed saray sananey a piligo nitatak so kasulatan nipaakar ed oley na arari, tan saray bakal tan baliñgaan na saray totook; dia ed ontan saraya a piligo so nigena a malaglaem nipaakar ed impanoley; tan saray sananey a piligo so nigena a malaglaem ed oley na arari tan saray bakal tan baliñgaan na saray totook.

5 Dia ed ontan, say Katawan ingangan to ed siak a gawaen ko so saraya a piligo ed makabat a gagala ed sikato, a saraya a gagala ag ko kabat.

6 Balet say Katawan kabat to so amin a beñgatla manlapu ed gapo; dia ed ontan, iparaan to so dalan ed pakasumpal na amin a kimey to ed limog na saray anak na totoo; tan nia, wala ed sikato so amin a pakapanyari ed pakasumpal na saray salita to. Tan sikato ya. Amen.
1-ne 10:
[center][font_size=26]Tekap 10[/font_size][/center]

[i]Si Lehi impasakbay to a saray Judio so nadakep na saray taga Babilonia—Imbaga to so isabi ed limog na saray Judio na sakey a Mesias, sakey a Manañgilaban, sakey a Mananundon—Si Lehi imbaga to met so isabi na sakey a maminiag ed Cordero na Dios—Si Lehi imbaga to so ipatey tan kioli ed bilay na Mesias—Impareng to so kitaytayak tan katipon na Israel ed sakey a kiew na oliva—Si Nephi nansalita nipaakar ed Anak na Dios, ed palabo na Espiritu Santo, tan say pankaukolan na inkamatunong. Ñgalñgali 600–592 S.C.[/i]

1 Tan natan siak, Nephi, ituloy ko ya iter so awaran ed saraya a piligo nipaakar ed saray dinmalan ed siak, tan say impanoley ko tan ontan met ed saray pulong ko; dia ed ontan, dia ed pañgituloy ko ed saya ya awaran ko, mansalita ak ed pakasalambit ko ed saray beñgatla nipaakar ed si amak, tan ontan met ed saray agagik.

2 Tan nia, agawa a kayari a si amak sinampotan to so pansasalita to nipaakar ed kugip to, tan ontan met ed pambibilin to ed sikara ed amin a panagseet, sikato so nansalita ed sikara nipaakar ed saray Judio—

3 Dia ed kayari na kaderal da, angan say baleg a ciudad na Jerusalem, tan dakel so saray awiten da a dakepen ed Babilonia, unong ed dili a panaon na Katawan, sikara so ompawil lamet, on, angan sikara so naawit ya ompawil ya ompaway na inkadakep; tan kayari a sikara so naawit ya ompawil ya ompaway na inkadakep kayarianen da lamet so dalin a tawir da.

4 On, angan anem a lasus taon manlapu ed panaon a si amak so tinmaynan ed Jerusalem, sakey a profeta so paletawen na Katawan a Dios ed limog na saray Judio—angan sakey a Mesias, odino, dia ed sananey a salita, sakey a Manañgilaban na mundo.

5 Tan sikato met so nansalita nipaakar ed saray profeta, no panon karakel so amaneknek ed saraya a beñgatla, nipaakar ed saya a Mesias, a sinalita ra, odino saya a Mananundon na mundo.

6 Dia ed ontan, amin a katooan wala ed abalang tan nigapol a kipapasen, tan magnayon ya ag ira nilaban likud no sikara so manmatalek ed saya a Mananundon.

7 Tan sikato met so nansalita nipaakar ed sakey a profeta a sikato so onsabi sakbay na Mesias, pian mañgiparaan ed dalan na Katawan—

8 On, angan sikato so onla tan mankelyaw ed kalawakan: Iparaan yo so dalan na Katawan, tan gawaen yo so saray basbas to a maptek; lapu ed wala so manalalagey ed limog yo ya ag yo kabat; tan sikato so lalo a makapanyari nen say siak, a say taker na sapatos to ag ak onkana a mañgukbar. Tan dakel so sinalita nen amak nipaakar ed saya a beñgatla.

9 Tan si amak inkuan to a sikato so maminiag ed Betania, ed paway na Jordan; tan inkuan to met a sikato so maminiag ed danum; angan sikato so maminiag ed say Mesias ed danum.

10 Tan kayari to a biniagan so Mesias ed danum, nanengneng to tan paneknekan to a bininiagan to so Cordero na Dios, a sikato so mañgekal ed saray kasalanan na mundo.

11 Tan agawa a kayari a si amak so nambalikas ed saraya a salita sikato so nansalita ed saray agagik nipaakar ed evangelio a nakaukolan ya ipulong ed limog na saray Judio, tan ontan met nipaakar ed ilasay na saray Judio ed ag-pananisia. Tan kayari a pinatey da so Mesias, a sikato so onsabi, tan kayari a sikato so pinatey sikato so onoli ya ombilay a manlapu ed saray inaatey, tan ipanengneng to so inkasikato, ed panamegley na Espiritu Santo, ed saray Gentiles.

12 On, angan si amak nansalita na dakel nipaakar ed saray Gentiles, tan ontan met nipaakar ed kailalakan na Israel, a sikara so nipareng ed sakey a kiew ya oliva, a saray sañga to nasipi-sipi tan nitaytayak ed lapag na tapew na dalin.

13 Dia ed ontan, imbaga to a nakaukolan a sikami so niwanwan ed saksakey a getma a mamaarap ed dalin a sipan, pian nasumpal so salita na Katawan, a sikami so nitayak ed tapew na dalin.

14 Tan dia ed kayari kitayak na kailalakan na Israel sikara so natipon lamet; odino, dia ed antikey a salita, kayari a saray Gentiles naawat da so inkagnap na Evangelio, saray peteg a sañga na kiew ya oliva, odino saray nakdaan ed kailalakan na Israel, nisuldong ira, odino nawalaan ira na pikakabat ed peteg a Mesias, a Katawan tan Mananundon da.

15 Tan dia ed saya a nengneng na pananalita si amak so namprofesiya tan nansalita ed saray agagik, tan ontan met dakel ni a beñgatla ya ag ko la isulat ed saya a libro; lapu ed insulat ko so dakel ni a manepeg ed siak ed arum a librok.

16 Tan amin a saraya a beñgatla, a saraya so sinalitak, so agawa legan na impanayam nen amak ed abong-abong ya abel, diman ed patar na Lemuel.

17 Tan agawa a kayari a siak, Nephi, dia ed impakadñgel ko ed saray amin a salita nen amak, nipaakar ed saray beñgatla ya anengneng to ed panamegley na sakey a payawar, tan ontan met ed saray beñgatla a sinalita to ed panamegley na pakapanyari na Espiritu Santo, a saya a pakapanyari so inawat to lapu ed pananisia to ed Anak na Dios—tan say Anak na Dios sikato so Mesias ya onsabi—siak, Nephi, pilalek ko met a nanengneng, tan nareñgel, tan nakabatan ko so saraya a beñgatla, ed panamegley na pakapanyari na Espiritu Santo, a saya so palabo na Dios ed saray maseseg a mananap ed sikato, a siñga dia ed daan a panaon tan ontan met ed panaon a sikato so mañgipatnag ed inkasikato ed saray anak na totoo.

18 Lapu ed sikato met lamlamang nen karoman, natan, tan dia ed ando la ya ando; tan say dalan so niparaan ya onkana ed amin a too a nanlapu la ed inletneg na mundo, no sikara so mambabawi tan ondago ed sikato.

19 Tan siopaman a maseseg a mananap makaalmo; tan saray misterio na Dios nalukasan ed sikara, ed panamegley na pakapanyari na Espiritu Santo, unong met ed saraya a panaon a siñga panaon nen saman, tan unong met ed saray panaon ya onsabi; dia ed ontan, say kurang na Katawan so sakey ya andi-angaan.

20 Dia ed onia nodnunot mo, O too, dia ed amin a kimey mo sika so naawit ed kaokom.

21 Dia ed ontan, no inanap mo so inkarelmeng ed saray agew na panagsubok mo, sika so kabekta narumog a marutak ed arap na yuroñgan na pañgokoman na Dios; tan angapo so marutak a beñgatla a nayari a miayam ed Dios; dia ed ontan, sika so nepeg ya ibantak ed paway ed ando la ya ando.

22 Tan say Espiritu Santo initer to so pakaoley pian siak so mansalita ed saraya a beñgatla, tan ag nayari ya itila.
1-ne 11:
[center][font_size=26]Tekap 11[/font_size][/center]

[i]Si Nephi anengneng to so Espiritu na Katawan tan niparungtal ed sikato ed sakey a payawar so kiew na bilay—Anengneng to so ina na Anak na Dios tan akabatan to so panagkawalo na Dios—Anengneng to so biniag, pampulong tan kipasak ed krus na Cordero na Dios—Anengneng to met so katawag tan pampulong na saray Labindua ya Apostoles na Cordero. Ñgalñgali 600–592 S.C.[/i]

1 Tan agawa a kayari na impampilalek ko a nakabatan so saray beñgatla ya anengneng nen amak, tan lapu ed pananisiak a say Katawan ipakabat to so saraya ed siak, sanen manyodyurong ak a manmomotektek ed dili a pusok naawit ak ed arawi dia ed Espiritu na Katawan, on, dia ed mapalalo ya atagey a palandey, a kapiganman ag ko ni anengneng, tan kapiganman ag ko ni agatinan.

2 Tan say Espiritu inkuan to ed siak: Nia, anto so pampilalekan mo?

3 Tan inkuan ko: Pilalek ko a nanengneng so saray beñgatla ya anengneng nen amak.

4 Tan say Espiritu inkuan to ed siak: Manisia ka a si amam anengneng to so kiew a sinalita to?

5 Tan kuan ko: On, kabat mo a manisia ak ed amin a salita nen amak.

6 Tan sanen nibalikas ko so saraya a salita, say Espiritu so inmeyag ed maksil a voces, a nankuan: Hosanna ed Katawan, say sankaatageyan a Dios; lapu ed sikato so Dios ed lapag na amin a dalin, on, iñgen dia ed tagey na amin. Tan mapalar ka, Nephi, lapu ed manisia ka ed Anak na sankaatageyan a Dios; dia ed ontan, nanengneng mo so saray beñgatla a pampilalekan mo.

7 Tan nengneng mo saya a beñgatla so niiter ed sika ya onkana a sakey a tanda, a dia ed kayarim a nanengneng so kiew a nambuñga na saman so atawayan nen amam, nanengneng mo met so sakey a too a mampapaleksab a manlapu ed tawen, tan sikato so tasian mo; tan kayarim a tasian paneknekan mo a sikato so Anak na Dios.

8 Tan agawa a say Espiritu inkuan to ed siak: Nengneng mo! Tan ninengneng ko tan anengneng ko so sakey a kiew; tan saya so kaolibay na kiew ya anengneng nen amak; tan say karakepan to arawi ya angapo so mipara, on, mapalalo ed karakepan; tan say puti to so apalabsanan to so puti na sinursor a nieve.

9 Tan agawa a kayari ya anengneng ko so kiew, inkuan ko ed Espiritu: Amuriak so impanengneng mo ed siak a kiew a saya so sankablian ed amin.

10 Tan inkuan to ed siak: Anto so pilalek mo?
