30 Tan sikatayo so nantepel na amin a nengneng na kairapan, tan ed saraya ya amin, ag la piga saraya so onkana ed kilaban na saray arum a kamarerua; tan impasen tayo a say gayaga tayo so manmaliw ya ayadyari no ag la piga bilang sikatayo so onkana ed kilaban na pigara.

31 Natan nia, nayarian tayo so onwandag tan nengneñgen so saray buñga na saray sagpot tayo; tan sikara kasi so pigpigara? Ikuan ko ed sikayo, Andi, sikara so amayamay; on, tan nayarian tayo a tasian so saray inkamatua ra, lapu ed panañgaro ra ed saray kaagian da tan ontan met ed sikatayo.

32 Tan nia, lablabayen da ya ibagat so saray bilay da nen say sikara so mañgekal na bilay na saray kabusol da; tan inkutkot da so saray agamil da ed bakal dia ed kaaraleman na dalin, lapu ed panañgaro ra ed saray kaagian da.

33 Tan natan nia ikuan ko ed sikayo, wala kasi ni so babaleg ya aro nen say saya ed amin a dalin? Nia, ikuan ko ed sikayo, Andi, angapo so siñga saya, angan dia ed limog na saray Nephite.

34 Tan nia, onlaban ira sumpa ed saray kaagian da; ag da nitepel ed inkasikara a sikara so napatey. Balet nia pigara ed sikara so initer da so bilay da; tan sikakabat itayo a sikara so linma ed Dios da, lapu ed aro ra tan pambusol da ed kasalanan.

35 Natan angapo kasi so rason tayo a mangayaga? On, ikuan ko ed sikayo, angapo kapiganman so totoo ya awalaan na ontan kabaleg a gayaga a siñga sikatayo, nanlapu ed ingapo na mundo; on, tan say gayagak so alablabas, angan say pampasirayew ko ed Dios ko; lapu ed wala ed sikato so amin a pakapanyari, amin a karonuñgan, tan amin a pakatalus; natebek to so amin a beñgatla, tan sikato so sakey a mapañgasi a Pinalsa, angan dia ed kilalaban, ed saraman so mambabawi tan manisia ed ñgaran to.

36 Natan no saya so panagpasirayew, angan ontan siak so mampasirayew; lapu ed sikatoya so bilay ko tan liwawak, say gayagak tan kilalaban ko, tan inkarundon ko nanlapu ed andi-angaan a dageyem. On, nagalang so ñgaran na Dios ko, a sikato so manunot ed saya a totoo, a sikara so sakey a sañga na kiew na Israel, tan saya so abalang ed señgeg to ed ag-kabat a dalin; on, ikuan ko, nagalang so ñgaran na Dios ko, lapu ed sikato so manunot ed sikatayo, a manaakar-akar ed ag-kabat a dalin.

37 Natan kaagian ko, anengneng tayo a say Dios so manunot ed amin a totoo, inerman a dalin so kawalaan da; on, binilang to so saray totoo to, tan say sankaaraleman a panañgasi to wala ed amin a lapag na mundo. Natan, saya so gayagak, tan baleg a pisalamatan ko; on, tan iter ko so pisasalamat ed Dios ko ya anga la ed anga. Amen.
alma 27:
[center][font_size=26]Tekap 27[/font_size][/center]

[i]Say Katawan ingangan to si Ammon ya iwanwan to so totoo na Anti-Nephi-Lehi ya onarawi ed kaatapan—Dia ed impakaabet to ed si Alma, say gayaga nen Ammon inupot to so biskeg to—Saray Nephite initer da ed saray Anti-Nephi-Lehi so dalin na Jershon—Sikara so atawag a totoo nen Ammon. Ñgalñgali 90–77 S.C.[/i]

1 Natan agawa a sanen saraman so Lamanite ya akibakal sumpa ed saray Nephite nalmo ra, kayari na dakel ya impanirap da a panderal ed sikara, ya angapo so kakanaan na panaanap da ed kaderal da, sikara so amawil lamet ed dalin na Nephi.

2 Tan agawa a saray Amalekite, lapu ed saray atigway ed sikara, mapalalo so pasnok da. Tan sanen anengneng da ya ag ira makabales ed saray Nephite, ginapoan da a pagalawen so saray totoo a mampasnok sumpa ed saray kaagian da, a saray totoo na Anti-Nephi-Lehi; dia ed ontan ginapoan da ra lamet a deralen.

3 Natan saya a totoo lamet ag da labay ya alaen so saray agamil da ed bakal, tan intepel da ed inkasikara so papatey unong ed pilalek na saray kabusol da.

4 Natan sanen si Ammon tan saray kaagian to anengneng da so saya a kimey na panagderal ed limog na saray pinabpabli ya inararo ra, tan ed limog na saray mamapabli a mañgaaro ed sikara—lapu ed impasen da a siñga ra angeles a nibaki a nanlapu ed Dios a mañgilaban ed sikara ed andi-angaan a kadederal—dia ed ontan, sanen si Ammon tan saray kaagian to anengneng da so saya a baleg a kimey na panagderal, sikara so atenyeg na panañgasi, tan inkuan da ed ari:

5 Tiponen tayo so saya a totoo na Katawan, tan onla itayo ed dalin na Zarahemla ed saray kaagian tayo a Nephite, tan ontaynan tayo ed lima na saray kabusol tayo, pian sikatayo so ag naderal.

6 Balet say ari inkuan to ed sikara: Nia, saray Nephite deralen da itayo, lapu ed dakel a panagpatey tan kasalanan a ginawa tayo sumpa ed sikara.

7 Tan si Ammon inkuan to: Onla ak tan itepet ko ed Katawan, tan no ibaga to ed sikatayo, onla itayo ed saray kaagian tayo, onla itayo kasi?

8 Tan say ari inkuan to ed sikato: On, no say Katawan ibaga to ya onla itayo, sikatayo so onla ed saray kaagian tayo, tan sikatayo so manmaliw ya aripen da anga ed naapiger tayo ed sikara so saray dakel ya impampatey tan kasalanan a ginawa tayo sumpa ed sikara.

9 Balet si Ammon inkuan to ed sikato: Saya so sumpa ed gangan na saray kaagian tayo, a saya so inletneg nen amak, a wala so aripen ed limog da; dia ed ontan sikatayo so onla tan manmatalek itayo ed panañgasi na saray kaagian tayo.

10 Balet say ari inkuan to ed sikato: Itepet mo ed Katawan, tan no ikuan to ya onla itayo, sikatayo so onla; odino andi sikatayo so ompatey ed saya a dalin.

11 Tan agawa a si Ammon so linma tan tinmepet ed Katawan, tan say Katawan inkuan to ed sikato:

12 Alaen mo so saya a totoo ya ipaway ed saya a dalin, pian ag ira ompatey; lapu ed si Satanas baleg so bemben to ed saray puso na saray Amalekite, a sikara so amagalaw ed saray Lamanite a mampasnok sumpa ed saray kaagian da a pateyen da ra; dia ed ontan paway kayo ed saya a dalin; tan mapalar so saya a totoo ed saya a kailalakan, lapu ed sikara so iagel ko.

13 Tan natan agawa a si Ammon so linma tan imbaga to ed ari so amin a salita ya imbalikas na Katawan ed sikato.

14 Tan tinipon da ya amin so saray totoo ra, on, amin a totoo na Katawan, tan tinipon da so amin a karnero tan baka ra, tan sikara so sinmipot a pinmaway ed saman a dalin, tan akasabi ra ed kalawakan a saya so amaldua ed dalin na Nephi ed say dalin na Zarahemla, tan sikara so akasabi ed asinger na saray ketegan na dalin.

15 Tan agawa a si Ammon inkuan to ed sikara: Nia, siak tan saray kaagian ko so onla ed dalin na Zarahemla, tan sikayo so natilak dia anga ed ipawil mi; tan suboken mi so puso na saray kaagian tayo, no labay da a sikayo so onla ed dalin da.

16 Tan agawa a sanen si Ammon so mamapaarap la ed saman a dalin, sikato tan saray kaagian to naabet da si Alma, ed sakey a pasen ya asalita la; tan nia, saya so magayaga ya impandorumog.

17 Natan say gayaga nen Ammon so mapalalo a baleg angan sikato so nanmaliw a nagnap; on, sikato so napno na gayaga ed Dios to, anga ed sikato so naupotan na biskeg; tan sikato lamet so niparukol ed dalin.

18 Natan aliwa kasi a saya so mapalalo a gayaga? Nia, saya so gayaga ya angapo ni so akaawat likud labat ed peteg a nambabawi tan mapaabeba a managanap na liket.

19 Natan say gayaga nen Alma ed impakarumog to ed kaagian to so matua a baleg, tan ontan met ed gayaga nen Aaron, nen Omner tan si Himni; balet nia say gayaga ra ag to apalabsanan so biskeg da.

20 Tan natan agawa a si Alma inolop to so saray kaagian to a pinmawil ed dalin na Zarahemla; angan dia ed dili ya abong to. Tan sikara so linma tan imbaga ra ed pañgulo ya okom so amin a beñgatla ya agawa ed sikara ed dalin na Nephi, dia ed limog na kaagian da, saray Lamanite.

21 Tan agawa a say pañgulo ya okom añgipaakseb na palapag ed amin a dalin, lapu ed pilalek to so voces na saray totoo nipaakar ed pañgawat da ed saray kaagian da, a sikara so totoo na Anti-Nephi-Lehi.

22 Tan agawa a say voces na saray totoo so sinmabi, a nankuan: Nia, iter tayo so dalin na Jershon, a wala ed bokig ya asinger ed dayat, a kasolduñgan na dalin na Bountiful, a saya so wala ed abalaten na dalin na Bountiful; tan saya a dalin na Jershon so iter tayo ed saray kaagian tayo ya ipatawir.

23 Tan nia, ilira tayo so saray ñgayew tayo ed baetan na dalin na Jershon tan dalin na Nephi, pian niagel tayo so saray kaagian tayo ed dalin na Jershon; tan saya so gawaen tayo lapu ed saray kaagian tayo, lapu ed takot da ya alaen so saray agamil da ed bakal sumpa ed saray kaagian da ag la piga sikara so makagawa na kasalanan; tan saya so baleg a takot da so sinmabi lapu ed ansakit a panagbabawi a ginawa ra, niseñgeg ed saray dakel ya impampapatey da tan makapataktakot a karelmeñgan da.

24 Tan natan nia, saya so gawaen tayo ed saray kaagian tayo, pian tawiren da so dalin na Jershon; tan sikara so bantayan tayo manlapu ed saray kabusol da ed panamegley na saray ñgayew tayo, dapot no mañgiter ira ed sikatayo na kabiañgan na saray tagano ra ya itulong da ed sikatayo a pantagano ed saray ñgayew tayo.

25 Natan, agawa a sanen si Ammon nadñgel to so saya, sikato so pinmawil ed saray totoo na Anti-Nephi-Lehi, tan kaolop to met si Alma, ed kalawakan, a diman da impaalagey so saray abong-abong da ya abel, tan impakabat da ed sikara so saraya ya amin a beñgatla. Tan si Alma tinungtong to met ed sikara so impakapasimbalo to ed pananisia, a kaiba to ra di Ammon tan Aaron, tan saray kaagian to.

26 Tan agawa a saman so akaseñgeg na baleg a gayaga ed limog da. Tan sikara so linma ed dalin na Jershon, tan kinayarian da so dalin na Jershon; tan sikara so tinawag na saray Nephite a totoo nen Ammon; dia ed ontan sikara so abirbir ed saman a ñgaran nanlapu ed saman.

27 Tan sikara so kabiañgan ed limog na saray totoo nen Nephi, tan nibilang met ira ed limog na totoo a wala ed simbaan na Dios. Tan sikara met so binirbir lapu ed seet da ya onkana ed Dios, tan ontan met ed saray totoo; lapu ed nagnap so inkamatua ra tan kaptekan da ed amin a beñgatla; tan sikara so ag-nagiing ed pananisia ed si Cristo, angan dia ed kasampotan.

28 Tan say pakanengneng da ed panagpaterter na dala na saray kaagian da so sankabalegan a pambusol; tan sikara so ag la kapiganman nakuyong a mandemet na saray agamil da ed bakal sumpa ed saray kaagian da; tan ag ira kapiganman onnengneng ed patey a wala so antokaman a takot, lapu ed say ilalo tan pakamuria ra ed si Cristo tan say kioli ed bilay; dia ed ontan, say patey so naakmon la ed sikara ed panamegley na pantaluna nen Cristo ed saya.

29 Dia ed ontan, mantepel ira na patey ed mapalalo tan makapasinagem a kanengneñgan a nipalikna manlapu ed saray kaagian da, sakbay ya alaen da so saray espada da odino melag a espada a pamatey da.

30 Dia ed saya sikara so sakey a maseseg tan inararo a totoo, saray sankamapalaran a totoo na Katawan.
alma 28:
[center][font_size=26]Tekap 28[/font_size][/center]

[i]Saray Lamanite so atalo ed sakey a makapataktakot a bakal—Asamplora a nilibo so inatey—Saray marelmeng so nigena ed sakey a kipapasen na andi-angaan a kaermenan; saray matunong so makagamor na angapo so kasampotan a liket. Ñgalñgali 77–76 S.C.[/i]

1 Tan natan agawa a kayari a saray totoo nen Ammon so niletneg ed dalin na Jershon, tan sakey a simbaan so inletneg met ed dalin na Jershon, tan saray ñgayew na Nephite so nilira ed kaliber-liber na Jershon, on, dia ed amin a ketegan ed kaliber-liber na dalin na Zarahemla; nia saray ñgayew na Lamanite tinumbok da so saray kaagian da ed kalawakan.

2 Tan dia ed onia wala so agawa a makapataktakot a bakal; on, angan angapo ni so mipara a kabat na saray totoo nanlapu ed saman so panaon ya intaynan nen Lehi ed Jerusalem; on, tan asamplora a nilibo so inaatey ed saray Lamanite tan sikara so ataytayak ed dakel a pasen.

3 On, tan wala met so dakerakel ya inaatey ed limog na saray totoo nen Nephi; angaman ontan, saray Lamanite so asunson tan nitaytayak, tan saray totoo nen Nephi so amawil lamet ed dalin da.

4 Tan natan saya so panaon ya inkiwala na baleg ya ermen tan pannañgis ya areñgel ed amin a pasen na dalin, ed limog na amin a totoo nen Nephi—

5 On, say akis na saray balo a bibii ed ermen da ed saray asawa ra a laki, tan ontan met ed kaamaan ed ermen da ed saray lalaki ya anak da, tan say bii ya anak ed agi to a laki, on, say laki ya agi ed ama to; tan dia ed saya say akis na ermen so nadñgel ed amin a limog da, ed ermen da ed saray kakanayon da ya inatey.

6 Tan natan peteg a saya so sakey a maermen ya agew; on, sakey a panaon a masimuon, tan sakey a panaon na dakel a panagayuno tan pikakasi.

7 Tan dia ed onia so impansampot na komalabinlima a taon ya oley na saray okom ed saray totoo nen Nephi;

8 Tan saya so kasulatan nen Ammon tan saray kaagian to, saray impambaroy da ed dalin na Nephi, saray impanirap da ed saman a dalin, saray ermen da, tan saray kairapan da, tan say ag-natebek a gayaga ra, tan say impañgawat tan ag nasigen a kipapasen na saray kaagian da ed dalin na Jershon. Tan natan komon say Katawan, a Mananundon na amin a totoo, binendicionan to so saray kamarerua ra ed ando la ya ando.

9 Tan saya so kasulatan na saray bakal tan baliñgaan ed limog na saray Nephite, tan ontan met ed saray bakal ed baetan na saray Nephite tan Lamanite; tan say komalabinlima a taon ya oley na saray okom so nansampot.

10 Tan nanlapu ed unaan a taon ya anga ed komalabinlima apalabas so inkaderal na dakel a nilibo a bilay; on, saya so añgawit na makapataktakot a nengneng na impamaterter na dala.

11 Tan saray bangkay na dakel a nilibo so akarukol ed dalin, legan a saray bangkay na dakel a nilibo so natetemek ya akalusbo ed tapew na dalin; on, tan dakel a nilibo so maneermen ed inkabalang na saray kakanayon da, say makaseñgeg wala so rason da ya ontakot, unong ed saray sipan na Katawan, lapu ed sikara so nigena ed kipapasen na andi-angaan ya kaermenan.

12 Legan a dakel a nilibo so peteg a maneermen ed inkabalang na saray kakanayon da, iñgen sikara so nangayaga tan nipatagey ed ilalo, tan iñgen sikakabat ira, unong ed saray sipan na Katawan, a sikara so ombañgon a manayam ed nikawanan a lima na Dios, ed kipapasen na angapo so kasampotan a liket.

13 Tan dia ed onia anengneng tayo no panon so ag-pampapara na too lapu ed kasalanan tan kasosumpa, tan say pakapanyari na demonyo, a manlalapu ed saray plano na kasiliban a ginawa to pian nakalotan to so saray puso na totoo.

14 Tan dia ed onia anengneng tayo so malaglaem a kerew na seet ed saray totoo a mansagpot ed saray kaolivaan na Katawan; tan dia ed onia anengneng tayo so baleg a rason na panermen, tan ontan met na pangayaga—ermen lapu ed patey tan kaderal ed limog na saray totoo, tan gayaga lapu ed liwawa nen Cristo onkana ed bilay.
alma 29:
[center][font_size=26]Tekap 29[/font_size][/center]

[i]Si Alma nampilalekan to so pañgikelyaw to na pambabawi tekep na makaangel a seseg—Say Katawan añgiter na saray managbañgat ed amin a bansa—Si Alma so nangloria ed kimey na Katawan tan dia ed maong a nansumpalan nen Ammon tan saray kaagian to. Ñgalñgali 76 S.C.[/i]

1 O no siak so sakey ya angel, tan naalak so pirawat na pusok, pian siak komon so onla tan mansalita ed panamegley na trompita na Dios, ed sakey a voces a yegyegen to so mundo, tan ikelyaw so pambabawi ed balang sakey a totoo!

2 On, ibawag ko ed balang sakey a kamarerua, a siñga dia ed voces na karul, so pambabawi tan say plano na pananundon, a sikara so nepeg a mambabawi tan ondago ed Dios tayo, pian angapo la komon so dakel ya ermen ed amin a tapew na dalin.

3 Balet nengneng yo, sakey ak a too, tan mankasalanan ak ed say pirawat ko; lapu ed nepeg pasaragen ko so saray beñgatla ya ingetar na Katawan ed siak.

4 Ag la manepeg a panaburidoan ko so saray pilalek ko ed say malet a gangan na matunong a Dios, lapu ed kabat ko ya iter to ed saray totoo so unong ed saray pilalek da, balang la no nipaakar ed patey odino nipaakar ed bilay; on, kabat ko ya igetar to ed saray totoo, on, ipaakseb to ed sikara so saray gangan ya ag-nauman, unong ed saray linawa ra, balang la no saraya so nipaakar ed kilalaban odino nipaakar ed kadederal.

5 On, tan kabat ko a say maong tan mauges so sinmabi ed amin a totoo; siopaman ya ag to kabat so maong ed mauges so andi-tetel; balet siopaman a kabat to so maong tan mauges, dia ed sikato niiter so unong ed saray pilalek to, no say kaliktan to so maong odino mauges, bilay odino patey, gayaga odino tetel na consiensia.

6 Natan, dia ed nanenengneng ko kabat ko so saraya a beñgatla, akin pampilalekan ko ni so babaleg nen say pangawak na kimey a saya so akatawagan ko?

7 Akin pampilalekan ko ni a siak so sakey ya angel, pian makapansalita ak ya anga ed amin a sampot na mundo?

8 Tan nia, say Katawan iter to ed amin a bansa, ed dili a bansa ra tan salita ra, na mañgibañgat ed salita to, on, dia ed kakabatan, amin a nanengneng to a manepeg a nawalaan ira; dia ed ontan anengneng tayo a say Katawan so mambilin ed kakabatan, unong ed dinan so manepeg tan matua.

9 Amtak no anto so ingangan na Katawan ed siak, tan mangloria ak ed saya. Ag ko panglorian so inkasiak, balet mangloria ak ed saman so ingangan na Katawan ed siak; on, tan saya so gloriak, pian komon manmaliw ak ya ikakana ed saray lima na Dios a mañgawit na pigara a kamarerua ed pambabawi; tan saya so gayagak.

10 Tan nia, sano nanenengneng ko a dakel ed saray kaagian ko so tua a nambabawi, tan ondadago ra ed Katawan a Dios da, dia ed saya say kamareruak napno na gayaga; dia ed saya nanunotan ko no anto so saray ginawa na Katawan ed siak, on, angan dineñgel to so saray pikakasik; on, dia ed saya nanunotan ko so mapañgasi a taklay to ya iniunat to ed siak.

11 On, tan nanunotan ko met so inkadakep na saray amak; lapu ed petepeteg a kabat ko ya inlaban ira na Katawan ya impaway ed inkaaripen, tan lapu ed saya inletneg so simbaan to; on, say Katawan a Dios, say Dios nen Abraham, say Dios nen Isaac, tan say Dios nen Jacob, so añgilaban ed sikara ed inkaaripen.

12 On, lawas ko a nonunoten so inkadakep na saray amak; tan saman met lamlamang a Dios so añgilaban ed sikara ed lima na saray taga-Egipto, ed inkaaripen.

13 On, tan saman met lamlamang a Dios so añgiletneg na simbaan to ed limog da; on, tan saman met lamlamang a Dios so nantawag ed siak ed masanto a kimey, a mañgipulong na salita ed saya a totoo, tan añgiter ed siak na dakel a maong a nansumpalan, a dia ed saya say gayagak so nagnap.

14 Balet ag ak nangayaga ed maong a nansumpalan ko a bukor, balet say gayagak so lalo a nagnap lapu ed say maong a nansumpalan na saray kaagian ko, a linma ed dalin na Nephi.

15 Nia, sikara so nansagpot a mapalalo, tan akapañgiter ira na dakel a buñga; tan agay la a kabaleg so tumang da!

16 Natan, sano nanunotan ko so maong a nansumpalan na saraya a kaagian ko say kamareruak so naawit ed arawi, anga ed isian to ed laman ko, a siñga nen saman, tan ontan la so kabaleg na gayagak.

17 Tan natan komon say Dios iter to ed saraya, a kaagian ko, a sikara komon so onyurong ed panarian na Dios; on, tan ontan met ed buñga na saray sagpot da pian komon sikara so ag la ompaway, balet sikara komon so mandayew ed sikato ya anga ed anga. Tan komon say Dios iter to a saya so nagawa unong ed saray salitak, iñgen unong ed sinalitak. Amen.
alma 30:
[center][font_size=26]Tekap 30[/font_size][/center]

[i]Si Korihor, sakey a sumpa ed si Cristo, nilemlemew to si Cristo, say Bagat a Pamaandi na Kasalanan, tan say espiritu na profesiya—Imbañgat to ya angapo so Dios, angapo so inkigapol na too, angapo so dusa na kasalanan, tan angapo so Cristo—Si Alma nampaneknek a si Cristo so onsabi tan amin a beñgatla so mañgitoturo a wala so Dios—Si Korihor kinmerew na sakey a tanda tan sikato so nanmaliw ya emel—Say demonyo so pinmarungtal ed si Korihor a siñga angel tan imbañgat to no anto so ibaga to—Si Korihor so agatin-gatinan tan inatey. Ñgalñgali 76–74 S.C.[/i]

1 Nia, natan agawa a kayari a saray totoo nen Ammon so niletneg ed dalin na Jershon, on, tan ontan met kayari a saray Lamanite so asunson ed paway na saman a dalin, tan saray inaatey da so intabon na saray totoo ed saman a dalin—

2 Natan saray inaatey so ag la abilang lapu ed kinarakel na saray bilang da; ni saray inaatey na saray Nephite so abilang—balet agawa a kayari ra ya intabon so saray inaatey da, tan ontan met kayari na saray agew na impanayuno, tan impanermen tan pikakasi, (tan saya so komalabinanem a taon ya oley na saray okom ed saray totoo nen Nephi) ginmapo so nampatuloy a kareenan ed lapag na saman a dalin.

3 On, tan saray totoo tinunton da a sumpalen so saray gangan na Katawan; tan malet so impansumpal da ed saray tutuntonen na Dios, unong ed gangan nen Moises; lapu ed nibañgat ed sikara a sumpalen da so saray gangan nen Moises ya anga ed saraya so nagnap.

4 Tan dia ed onia saray totoo angapo so beñgatla ya akagutgot ed sikara legan na komalabinanem a taon ya oley na saray okom ed saray totoo nen Nephi.

5 Tan agawa a sanen ingapo na komalabimpito a taon ya oley na saray okom, wala so nampatuloy a kareenan.

6 Balet agawa dia ed saguinunor ed komalabimpito a taon, sinmabi so sakey a too ed dalin na Zarahemla, tan sikato so Sumpa ed Cristo, lapu ed ginapoan to so mampulong ed saray totoo sumpa ed saray profesiya a sinalita na saray profeta, nipaakar ed isabi nen Cristo.

7 Natan angapo so gangan a sumpa ed pananisia na sakey a too; lapu ed mapeget a sumpa ed saray gangan na Dios a wala so sakey a gangan a mañgawit ed saray totoo ed ag pampapara a letnegan.

8 Tan onia so kuan na masanto a kasulatan: Pilien mo ed saya ya agew, no siopa so panlingkoran mo.

9 Natan no say sakey a too pilalek to so manlingkor ed Dios, saya so pankanawnawa to; odino, no sikato so manisia ed Dios sikato so mankanawnawa a manlingkor ed sikato; balet no sikato so ag manisia ed sikato angapo so gangan a mandusa ed sikato.

10 Balet no sikato so nampatey sikato so dusaen na patey; tan no sikato so nantulisan sikato met so nadusa; tan no sikato so nantakew sikato met so nadusa; tan no sikato so nangawa na pikakaloguran sikato met so nadusa; on, lapu ed saya ya amin a karelmeñgan sikara so nadusa.

11 Lapu ed wala so sakey a gangan a saray totoo so natutolan unong ed saray kasalanan da. Manwari ya ontan, angapo so gangan a sumpa ed pananisia na sakey a too; dia ed ontan, say sakey a too so nadusa labat ed saray kasalanan a ginawa to; dia ed ontan amin a totoo so wala ed nampapara a letnegan.

12 Tan saya a Sumpa ed Cristo, a say ñgaran to Korihor, (tan say gangan angapo so pakayari to a mambemben ed sikato) ginapoan to so mampulong ed saray totoo ya angapo so Cristo. Tan dia ed onia a kanengneñgan sikato so nampulong, a nankuan:

13 O sikayo ya abalor ed silong na makulang-kulang tan angapo so kakanaan ya ilalo, akin ipako yo so inkasikayo ed onia a makulang-kulang a beñgatla? Akin aanapen yo so sakey a Cristo? Lapu ed angapo so too a makapikabat ed antokaman ya onsabi.

14 Nia, saraya so beñgatla a tatawagen yo a profesiya, a kuan yo a saraya so nipalima nanlapu ed saray masanto a profeta, nia, saraya so makulang-kulang a sisia a tawir na kaamaan yo.

15 Panon so pikabat yo na katuaan na saraya? Nia, ag nayari ya amta yo so saray beñgatla ya ag yo nanengneng; dia ed ontan ag yo nayarian a naamtaan a wala so sakey a Cristo.

16 Sikayo so mantatalaran tan kuan yo ya anengneng yo so pamaandi na saray kasalanan yo. Balet nia, saya so kasumpalan na sakey a nagugulo a kanunotan; tan saya ya aliwa a mauksoy a kanunotan yo so sinmabi lapu ed sisia a tawir na kaamaan yo, a saya so añgitunton ya añgiarawi ed sikayo ed pananisia na saray beñgatla ya aliwa a tua.

17 Tan dakel ni a siñga onia a beñgatla so imbaga to ed sikara, ya imbaga to ya angapo so bagat a pamaandi na kasalanan a nagawa ya onkana ed kasalanan na saray totoo, balet balang sakey a too so mankurang ed saya a bilay unong ed kiwas na pinalsa; dia ed ontan balang sakey a too so onaliguas unong ed kakabatan to, tan balang sakey a too so ontaluna unong ed biskeg to; tan antokaman a gawaen na too aliwa a kasalanan.

18 Tan onia so impampulong to ed sikara, ya intunton to ya iniarawi so puso na dakerakel, a señgeg na impañgiatagey da ed saray ulo ra ed karelmeñgan da, on, dakel a bibii so nitunton a niarawi, tan ontan met ed saray lalaki, a mangawa na inkabalangkantis—ya imbabaga to ed sikara a sano say sakey a too so inatey la, saman la so kasampotan.

19 Natan saya a too linma ed dalin na Jershon met, a mañgipulong ed saraya a beñgatla ed limog na saray totoo nen Ammon, a sikara nen saman so totoo na saray Lamanite.

20 Balet nia sikara so lalo a makabat nen say dakel ed saray Nephite; tan sikato so inerel da, tan binalor da, tan sikato so inawit da ed arap nen Ammon, a sikato so atagey a sacerdote na saman a totoo.

21 Tan agawa a sikato so inawit da ya impaway ed dalin da. Tan sikato so akasabi ed dalin na Gideon, tan ginapoan to so mampulong ed sikara met; tan dia ag awalaan na dakel a maong a nansumpalan, lapu ed sikato so inerel da tan binalor tan inawit da ed arap na atagey a sacerdote, tan ontan met dia ed pañgulo ya okom ed dalin.

22 Tan agawa a say atagey a sacerdote inkuan to ed sikato: Akin kasi manliliber-liber ka a mamipikewet ed saray dalan na Katawan? Akin kasi ibabañgat mo ed saraya a totoo ya angapo so Cristo, pian patondaen mo so saray gayaga ra? Akin kasi mansasalita ka sumpa ed amin a profesiya na saray masanto a profeta?

23 Natan say ñgaran na saya ya atagey a sacerdote so Giddonah. Tan si Korihor inkuan to ed sikato: Lapu ed ag ko ibabañgat so makulang-kulang a sisia a tawir na kaamaan yo, tan lapu ed ag ko ibabañgat so saray totoo ya ipaldeg da so inkasikara ed saray makulang-kulang a tutuntonen tan gagawaen a saraya so impalima na saray kadaanan a sacerdote, pian pasuoten da ya alaen so pakapanyari tan pakaoley ed sikara, pian mansiansia ra ed andi-kakabatan, pian ag da ipaatagey so saray ulo ra, no ag iñgen sikara so naawit a mampaabeba unong ed saray salita yo.

24 Inkuan yo a saya a totoo so sakey a bulos a totoo. Nia, ikuan ko a sikara so wala ed inkadakep. Ikuan yo a saraman so kadaanan a profesiya so tua. Nia, ikuan ko ya ag yo kabat a saraya so tua.

25 Inkuan yo a saya a totoo so sakey a makasalanan tan nigapol a totoo, lapu ed impankasalanan na sakey ya ateng. Nia, ibagak a say sakey ya ogaw angapo so kasalanan to lapu ed saray ateng to.

26 Tan inkuan yo met a si Cristo so onsabi. Balet nia, ikuan ko ya ag yo kabat a wala so Cristo. Tan inkuan yo met a sikato so ompatey lapu ed saray kasalanan na mundo—

27 Tan dia ed onia intutunton yo so saraya a totoo ya ontumbok ed saray makulang-kulang a sisia a tawir na kaamaan yo, tan unong ed saray dili a pilalek yo; tan sikara so impaldeg yo, angan siñga sikara so wala ed inkadakep, pian patabaen yo so inkasikayo ed sagpot na saray lima da, pian ag da sarag so ontangwa a sitatalek, tan ag da pangayagaan so saray pankatunoñgan tan pankanawnawa ra.

28 On, ag da sarag ya ikana so saray kayarian da ag la piga napabaiñgan da so saray sacerdote ra, a sikara so añgipako ed sikara unong ed saray dili a pilalek da, tan inawit da ra a manisia, unong ed sisia a tawir tan saray kugip da tan saray kaliktan da tan saray payawar da tan saray konkonwari a misterio ra, a nepeg da a gawaen, lapu ed ag da gawaen so unong ed saray salita ra, napabaiñgan da so sakey a pinalsa ya ag-kabat, a sikato so ibabaga ra a Dios—sakey a pinalsa ya ag ni anengneng odino akabatan, a sikato so angapo nen saman odino kapiganman.

29 Natan sanen say atagey a sacerdote tan say pañgulo ya okom anengneng da so awet na puso to, on, sanen anengneng da a sikato so onsumpa angan dia ed Dios, ag ira inmebat ed saray salita to; balet ingangan da a sikato so baloren; tan sikato so iniawat da ya impalima ed saray manañgipañgulo, tan iniakar da ed dalin na Zarahemla, pian sikato so iarap da ed si Alma, tan say pañgulo ya okom a sikato met so gobernador ed amin na dalin.

30 Tan agawa a sanen sikato so naawit da ed arap nen Alma tan say pañgulo ya okom, intuloy to so gagawaen to a siñga sanen wala ed dalin na Gideon; on, intuloy to so pansasamba to.

31 Tan sikato so tinmalindeg ed agay la a lañgas na salita to ed arap nen Alma tan ininsulto to so saray sacerdote tan managbañgat, a pankakasalananen to a sikara so mañgitutonton ed saray totoo ed makulang-kulang a sisia a tawir ed kaamaan da, pian sikara so ontaba ed sagpot na saray totoo.

32 Natan si Alma inkuan to ed sikato: Kabat mo ya ag kami mampapataba ed saray sagpot na saya a totoo; tan nia siak so nansagpot nanlapu la ed ingapo na oley na saray okom ya anga ed natan, ed dili a limak ya onkana ed pambilay ko, manwari a dakel so pambabaroy ko a manliliber-liber ed saya a dalin pian ipalapag so salita na Dios ed saray totook.

33 Tan manwari a dakel so kimey a ginawak ed simbaan, ag ko añgawat na angan sakey a senine ed saray sagpot ko; ni siopaman ed saray kaagian ko, likud labat dia ed yuroñgan na panañgokoman; tan dia ed onia say inawat mi saman labat so unong ed gangan ed panaon mi.

34 Tan natan, no ag kami mañgawat na antokaman a beñgatla ed saray sagpot mi ed simbaan, anto so nagungonaan mi a mansagpot ed simbaan likud labat ed pañgibawag mi na katuaan, pian nawalaan kami na liket na gayaga ed saray kaagian mi?

35 Dia ed onia akin kasi ibagam a sikami so mampupulong ed saya a totoo pian makaala kami na gungona, balet sika, dia ed sika a dili, kabat mo ya angapo so gungona ya aawaten mi? Tan natan, a manisia ka a papalikdoen mi so saya a totoo, a saya so señgegan na ontan la a gayaga ed saray puso ra?

36 Tan si Korihor inmebat ed sikato, On.

37 Tan dia ed saya si Alma inkuan to ed sikato: Manisia ka kasi a wala so Dios?

38 Tan sikato so inmebat, Andi.

39 Natan si Alma inkuan to ed sikato: Iburim kasi ni lamet a wala so Dios, tan ontan met iburim ni si Cristo? Tan nia, inkuan ko ed sika, kabat ko a wala so Dios, tan ontan met a si Cristo so onsabi.

40 Tan natan anto so pakanengneñgan a wala ed sika ya angapo so Dios, odino si Cristo so ag onsabi? Ibagak ed sika ya angapo so nibagam, likud ed salitam labat.

41 Balet, nia, wala ed siak so amin a beñgatla a pamaneknek a saraya a beñgatla so tua; tan wala met ed sika so amin a beñgatla a pamaneknek a saraya so tua; tan saraya kasi so iburim? Manisia ka kasi a saraya a beñgatla so tua?

42 Nia, kabat ko a manisia ka, balet wala ed sika so mantitila ya espiritu, tan impulisay mo so Espiritu na Dios kanian angapo so pasen to ed sika; balet say demonyo wala so pakapanyari to ed sika, tan sika so ililibot to, a mankikimey ed panagpalikdo pian deralen to so saray anak na Dios.

43 Tan natan si Korihor inkuan to ed si Alma: No ipanengneng mo ed siak so sakey a tanda, pian nakuyong ak a wala so Dios, on, ipanengneng mo ed siak a wala so pakapanyari to, tan dia ed ontan nakuyong ak ed katuaan na saray salitam.

44 Balet si Alma inkuan to ed sikato: Wala la ed sika so magenap a tanda; tuksoen mo ni kasi so Dios mo? Ibagam ni kasi, Ipanengneng mo ed siak so sakey a tanda, angaman wala la ed sika so pamaneknek na amin a kaagian mo, tan amin met a masanto a profeta? Saray masanto a kasulatan so nigaton ed arapan mo, on, tan amin a beñgatla so mañgitoturo a wala so Dios; on, angan say dalin, tan amin a beñgatla a wala ed tapew to, on, tan say igagalaw to, on, tan ontan met na amin a planeta ya ongagalaw ed gendat ya uksoy da so mantasi a wala so Sankaatageyan a Manamalsa.

45 Tan siansia ka ni a manliliber-liber, a mañgitutonton a mañgiarawi ed puso na saya a totoo, a mampapaneknek ed sikara ya angapo so Dios? Tan iñgen mamburi ka sumpa ed saraya a mantatasi? Tan inkuan to: On, iburik, likud no mañgipanengneng ka ed siak na sakey a tanda.

46 Tan natan agawa a si Alma inkuan to ed sikato: Nia, siak so maermen lapu ed awet na pusom, on, tan siansia ni a sumpaen mo so espiritu na katuaan, pian say kamareruam komon so naderal.

47 Balet nia, magmaong ni a nabalang mo so kamareruam nen say sika so panseñgegan na dakel a kamarerua so napelag ed kadederal, lapu ed panagtilam tan say makasagiat a salitam; dia ed ontan no mamburi ka lamet, nia say Dios bakbaken to ka, pian sika so manmaliw ya emel, pian ag mo la nilukas so sañgim kapiganman, pian ag mo la palikdoen so saya a totoo kapiganman.

48 Natan si Korihor inkuan to ed sikato: Ag ko iburi so kiwala na Dios, balet ag ko manisia a wala so Dios; tan ikuan ko met, ya ag mo kabat a wala so Dios; tan likud no ipanengneng mo ed siak so sakey a tanda, ag ak manisia.

49 Natan si Alma inkuan to ed sikato: Saya so iter ko ed sika a sakey a tanda, a sika so nabakbak na inkaemel, unong ed saray salitak; tan ikuan ko, dia ed ñgaran na Dios, sika so nabakbak na inkaemel, pian kapiganman ag ka la makasalita.

50 Natan sanen si Alma imbaga to so saraya a salita, si Korihor so abakbak na inkaemel, kanian ag la makasalita, unong ed saray salita nen Alma.

51 Tan natan sanen say pañgulo ya okom anengneng to so saya, sikato so nangawa na sulat ed si Korihor, a nankuan: Manisia ka la ed pakapanyari na Dios? Dia ed sikato so nampilalekan mo a si Alma mañgipanengneng na tanda? Labay mo kasi a pairapen to ni so arum, pian ipanengneng to ed sika so sakey a tanda? Nengneng mo, impanengneng to ed sika so sakey a tanda; tan natan aruman mo ni so pansumpam?

52 Tan si Korihor iniunat to so lima to tan nansulat, a nankuan: Kabat ko a sakey ak la ya emel, lapu ed ag ak makapansalita; tan amtak ya angapo likud ed pakapanyari na Dios so makapañgiter ed saya ed siak; on, tan lawas kabat ko a wala so Dios.

53 Balet nia, say demonyo pinalikdo to ak; lapu ed pinmanengneng ed siak ed kanengneñgan na sakey ya angel, tan inkuan to ed siak: Onla ka tan bawim so saya a totoo, tan sikara ya amin so abalang a tinmumbok ed ag-kabkabat a Dios. Tan inkuan to ed siak: Angapo so Dios; on, tan imbañgat to ed siak so nepeg ko ya ibaga. Tan imbañgat ko so saray salita to; tan imbañgat ko lapu ed saraya so makaruyo ed minomundo a kanunotan; tan saraya so imbañgat ko, angan agamoran ko so dakel a maong a nansumpalan, anga ed anisia ak a saraya so petepeteg a tua; tan lapu ed saya sinumpak so katuaan, anga ed naawit ko so saya a baleg ya ayew ed siak.

54 Tan sanen asalita to so saya, mikakasi ed si Alma ya ipikasi to ed Dios, pian saya a baleg ya ayew so naekal ed sikato.

55 Balet si Alma inkuan to ed sikato: No saya ya ayew so naekal ed sika itunton mo ya iarawi lamet so saray puso na saya a totoo; dia ed ontan, nagawa ed sika unong ed linawa na Katawan.

56 Tan agawa a say ayew so ag naekal ed si Korihor; balet sikato so impaliis da ed paway, tan sikato so linma ed balang sakey ya abong a mipapayabol na naakan to.

57 Natan say pikakabat ed agawa ed si Korihor so tampol a nipalapag ed dalin; on, sakey a palapag so impaitayak na pañgulo ya okom ed amin a totoo ed dalin, ya imbawag da ed saray anisia ed saray salita nen Korihor a nakaukolan da so mambabawi a tampol, ag la piga saya met lamlamang a dusa so onsabi ed sikara.

58 Tan agawa a sikara ya amin so anisia ed karelmeñgan nen Korihor; dia ed ontan sikara lamet so nampasimbalo ed pananisia ed Katawan; tan dia la nansampot so karumsisan na saray bañgat nen Korihor. Tan si Korihor so linma ed balang sakey abong, a mipapayabol na pambilay to.

59 Tan agawa a sanen sikato so linma ed limog na saray totoo, on, ed limog na saray totoo ya insian da so inkasikara ed saray Nephite tan tinawag da so inkasikara a Zoramite, lapu ed sikara so impañgulo na sakey a too a manñgaran na Zoram—tan sanen sikato so linma ed limog da, nia, sikato so inosilan da tan ginagatin-gatinan da, anga ed sikato so inatey.

60 Tan dia ed onia anengneng tayo so impansampot na saman so amikewet ed saray dalan na Katawan; tan dia ed onia anengneng tayo a say demonyo ag to tuloñgan so saray anak to ed kaunoran ya agew, balet masiglat to ra ya igayugoy a paleksab ed infierno.
alma 31:
[center][font_size=26]Tekap 31[/font_size][/center]

[i]Si Alma impañgulo to so sakey ya olop na panagpuloñgan a mamawi na saray sinmian ed pananisia a Zoramite—Saray Zoramite imburi ra si Cristo, manisia ra ed aliwa a tua a pananisia ed panagpili, tan mampipikasi ra na nigetar a panagpikasi—Saray managpulong so napno na Masanto ya Espiritu—Saray irap da so naakmon ed gayaga ra ed si Cristo. Ñgalñgali 74 S.C.[/i]

1 Natan agawa a kayari impansampot nen Korihor, lapu ed naawat nen Alma so balita a saray Zoramite pipikeweten da so dalan na Katawan, tan si Zoram, a sikato so pañgulo ra, so mañgitutonton ed puso na saray totoo ya ontewek ed saray talintao, say puso to lamet so ginmapo ya onsinagem lapu ed karelmeñgan na saray totoo.

2 Tan saya so señgegan na baleg ya ermen nen Alma nen akabatan to so karelmeñgan ed limog na saray totoo to; dia ed onia say puso to so mapalalo ya apaermen lapu ed insian na saray Zoramite ed saray Nephite.

3 Natan saray Zoramite so nantitipon ed sakey a dalin a saya so tinawag da na Antionum, a saya so wala ed bokig na Zarahemla, a ñgalñgali miketeg ya asinger ed gilig na dayat, ed abalaten na dalin na Jershon, a saya met so miketeg ed kalawakan ed abalaten, a saya a kalawakan so napno na saray Lamanite.

4 Natan saray Nephite baleg so takot da ag la piga saray Zoramite onloob ira ed sakey a talusan ed saray Lamanite, tan saya so panseñgegan na dakel a nabalang ed kabiañgan na saray Nephite.

5 Tan natan, unong a say panagpulong na salita wala so baleg a tanguyor to a mañgitunton ed saray totoo a mangawa na kaptekan—on, awalaan na mabiskeg a pakapanyari ed saray kanunotan na saray totoo nen say espada, odino angan dinan a beñgatla, ya agawa ed sikara—dia ed ontan anunotan nen Alma a nakaukolan a suboken da so pakayari na salita na Dios.

6 Dia ed ontan intarok to si Ammon, tan si Aaron, tan si Omner; tan si Himni intilak to ed simbaan ed Zarahemla; balet saray abitla ya unaan a talora so intarok to a kaiba to, tan ontan met ed si Amulek tan si Zeezrom, a sikara so wala ed Melek; tan intarok to met so duara ed saray anak to a lalaki.

7 Natan say sankapañguloanan ed saray anak to a lalaki so ag to intarok, tan say ñgaran to Helaman; balet say ñgaran na saray intarok to si Shiblon, tan si Corianton; tan saraya so ñgaran na linma ya akiolop ed sikato ed limog na saray Zoramite, a mañgipulong ed sikara na salita.

8 Natan saray Zoramite so sinmian a nanlapu ed saray Nephite; dia ed ontan wala la ed sikara so salita na Dios a nipulong ed sikara.

9 Balet sikara so naplag ed saray baleg a liñgo, lapu ed ag da susumpalen so saray gangan na Dios, tan saray tutuntonen to, unong ed gangan nen Moises.

10 Ni say sikara so manusumpal ed saray gagawaen ed simbaan, a mampatuloy ira ed panagpikasi tan onkerew na abagey ed Dios ya inagew-agew, pian ag ira napelag ed tukso.

11 On, dia ed magano a salita, pinikewet da so saray dalan na Katawan ed dakerakel a pamaakaran; dia ed ontan, lapu ed saya a señgegan, si Alma tan saray kaagian to so linma ed saman a dalin pian ipulong da so salita ed sikara.

12 Natan, sanen sikara so akasabi ed saman a dalin, nia, dia ed baleg a pankelaw da arumog da a saray Zoramite so nampaalagey na sinagogas, tan nantitipon ira ed inkasikara ed sakey ya agew ed loob na sakey simba, a saya ya agew so tatawagen da ya agew na Katawan; tan sikara so mampipikasi ed kanengneñgan na sakey a panañgigalang ya ag ni kapiganman anengneng nen Alma tan saray kaagian to;

13 Tan wala so sakey a pasen ya impaalagey da ed pegley na sinagoga ra, a saya so pasen a talindegan, ya atagey nen say katagey na ulo; tan dia ed tapew to nia sakey a too labat so nayarian to.

14 Dia ed ontan, siopaman a mampilalek a mañgigalang sikato so onla ya ontalindeg ed tapew to nia, tan iunat to so saray lima to a paarap ed tawen, tan ikelyaw to ed maksil a voces, a mankuan:

15 Masanto, masanto a Dios; manisia kami a sika so Dios, tan manisia kami a sika so masanto, tan sika so sakey ya espiritu nen saman, tan sika so espiritu natan, tan sika so espiritu ed ando la ya ando.

16 Masanto a Dios, manisia kami ya insian mo kami ed saray kaagian mi; tan ag kami manisia ed sisia a tawir na saray kaagian mi, a saya so iniawat ed sikara na saray inuogaw a kagagawa na kaamaan da; balet manisia kami a pinili mo kami a manmaliw a masanto ya anak mo; tan ontan met impakabat mo ed sikami ya angapo so Cristo.

17 Balet sika met lamlamang nen karoman, natan, tan dia ed andi-angaan; tan sikami so pinilim pian sikami so nilaban, balet amin a wala ed kaliber-liber mi sikara so apili ya ibantak dia ed sanok mo ed dalem na infierno; a lapu ed saya ya inkasanto, O Dios, misalamat kami ed sika; tan misalamat kami met ed sika lapu ed pinili mo kami, pian sikami ag nitunton a niarawi ed saray makulang-kulang a sisia a tawir na saray kaagian mi, a saya so mamabalor ed sikara ed pananisia ed si Cristo, a saya so mañgitutonton na saray puso ra ya onarawi ed sika, a Dios mi.

18 Tan lamet misalamat kami ed sika, O Dios, lapu ed sikami so sakey ya apili tan masanto a totoo. Amen.

19 Natan agawa kayari a si Alma tan saray kaagian to tan saray anak to a lalaki nadñgel da so saraya a pikakasi, sikara so nankelaw ya ag nasoksukat.

20 Tan nengneng yo, balang sakey a too so linma tan mampikasi na saman lamlamang a pikakasi.

21 Natan saya a pasen so tinawag da na Rameumptom, a saya, no ipatalus, so masanto a panagtalindegan.

22 Natan, manlapu ed saya a talindegan sikara so mañgiapay, balang sakey a too, na saman lamlamang a pikakasi ed Dios da, a misalamat ira ed Dios lapu ed sikara so pinili to, tan ag to ra intunton a niarawi ed saray sisia a tawir na saray kaagian da, tan saray puso ra so ag atakew a manisia ed saray beñgatla ya onsabi, a saya angapo so pikakabat da.

23 Natan, kayari na amin a totoo so akapañgiapay na pisasalamat ed onia a kanengneñgan, sikara so pinmawil ed saray kaaboñgan da, ya ag da la bibitlaen lamet so Dios da anga ed ontumbok a pantitipon da lamet ed masanto a talindegan, pian iyapay da lamet so pisasalamat unong ed ugali ra.

24 Natan sanen si Alma anengneng to saya say puso to so apaermen; lapu ed anengneng to a sikara so marelmeng tan managpikewet a totoo; on, anengneng to a saray puso ra so akateen ed balitok, tan pilak, tan amin a nengneng na mararakep ya ikakana.

25 On, tan anengneng to met a saray puso ra so nipaatagey ed baleg a panagpasirayew, dia ed kinon da.

26 Tan intagey to so voces to ed tawen, tan nankelyaw, a nankuan: O, kaonoñgan kabayag, O Katawan, so panirap na saray igagangan mo a manayam dia ed leksab na inkalaman, a manimaton na onia a sankaugesan a karelmeñgan ed limog na saray anak na totoo?

27 Nengneng mo, O Dios ko, sikara so onnanañgis ed sika, tan balet saray puso ra so tinmaluna so kinon da. Nengneng mo, O Dios, sikara so mannañgis ed sika ed saray sañgi ra, balet sikara so sinmibok a nipaatagey, angan dia ed pambaleg-balegan, na saray beñgatla ya andi-kana ed mundo.

28 Nengneng mo, O Dios ko, so saray ankabli a kawes da, tan saray singsing da, tan saray pulseras da, tan saray alahas da a balitok, tan saray beñgatla ya ankabli ya arkos ed sikara; tan nengneng mo, saray puso ra so niteen ed saraya, tan siansia ni a sikara so mankelyaw ed sika tan kuan da—Misalamat kami ed sika, O Dios, lapu ed sikami so sakey ya apili a totoo ed sika, balet saray arum so nabalang.

29 On, tan ibabaga ra ya impakabat mo ed sikara ya angapo so Cristo.

30 O Katawan a Dios, kaonoñgan kabayag so pañgitepel ed say onia a karelmeñgan tan ag-inkamatuor a wala ed limog na saya a totoo? O Katawan, iter mo ed siak so biskeg, pian nitepel ko so saray kakapoyan ko. Lapu ed siak so makapoy, tan say onia a karelmeñgan ed limog na saraya a totoo so mañgiiter na irap ed kamareruak.

31 O Katawan, say pusok so mapalalo a maermen; ligliwam pa so kamareruak ed Cristo. O Katawan, iter mo pa ed siak pian nawalaan ak na biskeg, pian siak so makatepel a siaanos ed saraya ya irap ya onsabi ed siak, lapu ed karelmeñgan na saray totoo.

32 O Katawan, ligliwam pa so kamareruak, tan iter mo ed siak so maong a pansumpalan, tan ontan met ed saray kaibak a komikimey a kaolop ko—on, si Ammon, tan si Aaron, tan si Omner, tan ontan met nen Amulek tan si Zeezrom, tan saraman met so duara ya anak ko a lalaki—on, angan amin da sikara so ligliwam, O Katawan. On, ligliwam pa so saray kamarerua ra ed si Cristo.

33 Iter mo pa ed sikara pian nawalaan ira na biskeg, pian nitepel da so saray irap ya onsabi ed sikara lapu ed karelmeñgan na saya a totoo.

34 O Katawan, iter mo pa ed sikami pian nawalaan kami na maong a pansumpalan ed pañgawit mi ed sikara lamet ed sika dia ed Cristo.

35 Nia, O Katawan, saray kamarerua ra so pinabli, tan dakel ed sikara so kaagian mi; dia ed ontan, iter mo ed sikami, O Katawan, so pakapanyari tan kakabatan pian naawit mi so saraya, saray kaagian mi, lamet ed sika.

36 Natan agawa sanen imbalikas nen Alma so saraya a salita, intapew to so saray lima to ed amin a kaolop to. Tan nia, dia ed impañgitapew to na lima to ed sikara, sikara so napno na Masanto ya Espiritu.

37 Tan kayari to nia sikara so nansisian ed balang sinansakey, ya angapo so kanunotan da ed inkasikara no anto so kanen da odino anto so inomen da, odino anto so isulong da.

38 Tan say Katawan so nantalima ed sikara pian sikara so ag naerasan, ni say sikara so napaet; on, tan initer to met ed sikara so biskeg, pian nitepel da so antokaman a kanengneñgan na irap, likud no saraya so naakmon na gayaga ed si Cristo. Natan saya so unong ed pikakasi nen Alma; tan saya lapu ed sikato so nampikasi dia ed pananisia.
alma 32:
[center][font_size=26]Tekap 32[/font_size][/center]

[i]Si Alma imbañgat to so saray duka a saray irap da so nampaabeba ed sikara—Say pananisia so sakey ya ilalo ed saman so ag nanengneng a saya so tua—Si Alma so nampaneknek a saray angeles so mantalima ed saray lalaki, bibii tan ugogaw—Si Alma impareng to so salita ed sakey a bokel—Saya so nakaukolan ya itanem tan bayuboan—Dia ed ontan saya so ombaleg a manmaliw a kiew a dia ed saya, so pamburboran na buñga na bilay ya andi-angaan. Ñgalñgali 74 S.C.[/i]

1 Tan agawa a sikara so linma, tan ginapoan da ya ipulong so salita na Dios ed saray totoo, a linmoob ira ed saray sinagogas da, tan dia ed saray kaaboñgan da; on, tan angan dia ed saray dalan da sikara so nampulong na salitak.

2 Tan agawa a kayari na dakel a sagpot ed saray limog da, ginmapo a makagamor ira na maong a nansumpalan ed limog na saray totoo a duka; tan nia, sikara so pinapaway da ed saray sinagogas da lapu ed gasal na saray kawes da—

3 Dia ed ontan ag ira naabuloyan ya onloob ed saray sinagogas da a mañgigalang ed Dios, lapu ed ipapasen da a sikara so marutak; dia ed ontan sikara so duka; on, sikara so ibibilang na saray kaagian da a makadutadutak; dia ed ontan sikara so duka ed saray minomundo a beñgatla; tan ontan met sikara so duka ed puso.

4 Natan, legan a si Alma so mambabañgat tan mansasalita ed saray totoo ed pukdol na Onidah, wala so sinmabi a baleg a karaklan ed sikato, a sikara so saray asalita la, a duka ed puso, lapu ed inkaduka ra nipaakar ed saray beñgatla ed minomundo.

5 Tan sikara so linma ed si Alma; tan say sakey ed sikara a sikato so manunaan ed limog da inkuan to ed sikato: Nia, anto so gawaen na saraya so kaagian ko, lapu ed sikara so babalawen na amin a totoo lapu ed inkaduka ra, on, tan nagkalalo la na saray sacerdote mi; lapu ed sikami so pinapaway da ed saray sinagogas mi a sikami so nansagpot na dakel ya añgipaalagey ed saray dili a lima mi; tan sikami so pinapaway da lapu ed mapalalo ya inkaduka mi, tan angapo so pasen a pañgigalañgan mi ed Dios mi; tan nia, anto so gawaen mi?

6 Tan natan sanen si Alma nadñgel to so saya, sikato so linmiñgaw, a say lupa to so bigla ya iniarap to ed sikato, tan anengneng to ed baleg a gayaga; lapu ed anengneng to a saray kairapan da so peteg a nampaabeba ed sikara, tan sikara so akaparaan ya ondeñgel ed salita.

7 Dia ed ontan sikato so ag la nansalita ed saman so sananey a karaklan; balet iniunat to so lima to, tan nankelyaw ed saraman so anengneng to, a sikara so peteg a nambabawi, tan inkuan to ed sikara:

8 Anengneng ko a sikayo so apaabeba ed puso; tan no ontan, mapalar kayo.

9 Nia say agi yo inkuan to: Anto so gawaen mi?—lapu ed sikami so pinapaway da ed saray sinagogas mi, kanian ag kami makapañgigalang ed Dios mi.

10 Nia ikuan ko ed sikayo, ipapasen yo kasi ya ag kayo makapañgigalang ed Dios likud no dia ed dalem na saray sinagogas labat?

11 Tan kaaruman ni, siak so ontepet, ipapasen yo kasi a maminsan labat so pañgigalang yo ed Dios ed loob na sakey simba?

12 Ikuan ko ed sikayo, maong a sikayo so pinapaway da ed saray sinagogas yo, pian sikayo so mampaabeba, tan pian naaral yo so kakabatan; lapu ed nakaukolan a naaralan yo so kakabatan; lapu ed sikayo so pinapaway da, a sikayo so binalaw na saray kaagian yo lapu ed mapalalo ya inkaduka yo, kanian sikayo so naawit ed saya a kaabebaan na puso; lapu ed sikayo so nakaukolan a naawit a mampaabeba.

13 Tan natan, lapu ed sikayo so apasuotan a mampaabeba mapalar kayo; lapu ed say too no maminsan, no sikato so napasuotan a mampaabeba, anapen to so pambabawi; tan natan petepeteg, siopaman a mambabawi makaalmo na panañgasi; tan siopaman so makarumog na panañgasi tan mansiansia ya anga ed sampot sikato met lamlamang so nilaban.

14 Tan natan, unong ed inkuan ko ed sikayo, lapu ed sikayo so apasuotan a mampaabeba sikayo so mapalar, ag yo kasi ipasen a lalo a mapalar so peteg a paabebaen da so inkasikara lapu ed salita?

15 On, siopaman so mampaabeba ed inkasikato a dili, tan mambabawi ed saray kasalanan to, tan mansiansia ya anga ed sampot, sikato met lamlamang so napalaran—on, lalo a mapalar nen say saraman so apasuotan a mampaabeba lapu ed mapalalo ya inkaduka ra.

16 Dia ed ontan, mapalar so saraman so mampaabeba ed inkasikara a dili ya ag ira apasuotan a mampaabeba; odino magmaong ni, dia ed sananey a salita, mapalar so siopaman a manisia ed salita na Dios, tan nabiniagan ya angapo so inkabañgar ed puso to, on, ya ag naawit ed pikakabat na salita, odino angan apasuotan a makapikabat, sakbay a sikara so manisia.

17 On, dakel so saray mankuan: No ipanengneng mo ed sikami so sakey a tanda a manlapu ed tawen, dia ed saya nakabatan mi a saya so peteg; dia ed saya sikami so manisia.

18 Natan tepeten ko, saya kasi so pananisia? Nia, ikuan ko ed sikayo, Andi; no say sakey a too kabat to la so sakey a beñgatla angapo la so makaseñgeg a sikato so manisia, lapu ed saya kabat to la.

19 Tan natan, lalo ni a naayew so sakey a kabat to la so linawa na Dios tan saya so ag to gawaen, nen say saman so manisia labat, odino wala so makaseñgeg a sikato so manisia, tan napelag ed kasalanan?

20 Natan nipaakar ed saya a beñgatla sikayo so mantutol. Nia, ikuan ko ed sikayo, a nagawa ed sakey a lima angan ontan met ed sananey; tan saya so nagawa ed balang sakey a too unong ed saray kimey to.

21 Tan natan unong ed asalitak la nipaakar ed pananisia—say pananisia ag nakaukolan a wala so nagnap a pikakabat ed saray beñgatla; dia ed ontan no walaan kayo na pananisia ilaloan yo so saray beñgatla ya ag nanengneng, a saraya so tua.

22 Tan natan, nia, ikuan ko ed sikayo, tan komon nunoten yo, a say Dios mapañgasi ed amin a manisia ed ñgaran to; dia ed ontan pampilalekan to, ed unaonaan, a kaukolan sikayo so manisia, on, angan dia ed salita to.

23 Tan natan, initer to so salita to ed panamegley na saray angeles ed saray totoo, on, aliwa labat ed saray lalaki balet dia ed saray bibii met. Natan aliwa ni a saya ya amin; saray ankekelag ya ugogaw niiter ed sikara so saray salita to ed dakel a panaon, a saya so nankewkew ed saray makabat tan saray awalaan na aral.

24 Tan natan, inararok a kaagian, unong ed pilalek yo a kabaten ed siak no anto so gawaen yo lapu ed sikayo so nanlikna na irap tan sikayo so pinapaway da—natan ag ko pilalek ya ipasen yo a say labay ko ya ibaga so pañgokom ko ed sikayo labat unong ed saman so tua—

25 Lapu ed ag ko labay ya ibaga yo ya amin yo so apasuotan a mampaabeba ed inkasikayo a dili; tan peteg a manisia ak a wala ed limog yo so nampaabeba ed inkasikara, paulyan yo ra a mansiansia ed antokaman a kipapasen a kawalaan da.

26 Natan, unong ed asalitak la nipaakar ed pananisia—a saya so aliwa a nagnap a pikakabat—angan ontan saya so unong ed saray salitak. Ag yo kabat so katuaan na saraya ed unaan, ed inkagnap, a lalo ni nen say pananisia so sakey a nagnap a pikakabat.

27 Balet nia, no bañgonen tan liiñgen yo so saray pakayari yo, ya angan salsalien yo so saray salitak, tan ikana yo so angan melag a pananisia, on, angano say nayarian yo a pampilalekan so say manisia, paulyan yo a saya a pilalek so mankimey ed sikayo, ya anga ed sikayo so manisia ed sakey a kanengneñgan pian niiter yo so pasen ed kabiañgan na saray salitak.

28 Natan, ipareng tayo so salita ed sakey a bokel. Natan, no initer yo so pasen, pian say sakey a bokel so nitanem ed puso yo, nia, no saya so tua a bokel, odino maong a bokel, no saya so ag yo ibantak lapu ed ag-pananisia, pian sumpaen yo so Espiritu na Katawan, nia, saya so ongapo ya ombaleg ed dalem na saray pagew yo; tan sano nalikna yo so saraya ya ombaleg ya ongagalaw, ongapo kayo a mankuan ed inkasikayo—Nakaukolan sirin a saya so maong a bokel, odino say salita so maong, lapu ed ginapoan to a pabalegen so kamareruak; on, gagapoan to a paliliwawaen so pakatalus ko, on, gagapoan to so onnanam ed siak.

29 Natan nia, ag kasi saya so mañgarum ed pananisia yo? Ikuan ko ed sikayo, On; angaman ontan saya so ag ni tinmubo ed nagnap a pikakabat.

30 Balet nengneng yo, legan a say bokel so ombabaleg tan ombabasik, tan ongagapo ya ontubo, dia ed saya nakaukolan a nepeg yo ya ikuan a say bokel so maong; tan nia saya so binmaleg, tan binmasik, tan ginmapo la ya ontubo. Tan natan, nia, ag kasi saya so mamabiskeg ed pananisia yo? On, saya so mamabiskeg ed pananisia yo: lapu ed ikuan yo kabat ko a saya so sakey a maong a bokel; tan nia saya so binmasik tan ginmapo ya ontubo.

31 Tan natan , nia, peteg kasi a saya so maong a bokel? Ikuan ko ed sikayo, On; tan balang sakey a bokel papawayen to so kaolibay to.

32 Dia ed ontan, no say sakey a bokel so ontubo saya so maong, balet no saya so ag tinmubo, nia saya so aliwa a maong, dia ed ontan saya so ibantak.

33 Tan natan, nia, lapu ed sinubok yo so saya a salsali, tan intanem yo so bokel, tan saya so binmaleg tan binmasik, tan ginmapo ya ontubo, kaukolan yo a kabaten a saman a bokel so maong.

34 Tan natan, nia, say pikakabat yo kasi so nagnap la? On, say pikakabat yo so nagnap la ed saman a beñgatla, tan say pananisia yo so ag-onkakana; tan saya lapu ed amta yo, lapu ed kabat yo a say salita pinaliket to so saray kamarerua yo, tan kabat yo met a saya so binmasik, a say pakatalus yo so ginmapo ya onliwawa, tan say nunot yo so ginmapo ya onlaknab.

35 O sirin, ag kasi saya so petepeteg? Ikuan ko ed sikayo, On, lapu ed saya so liwawa; tan antokaman a liwawa, so maong, lapu ed saya so natalusan, dia ed ontan kaukolan a kabaten yo a saya so maong; tan natan nia, kayari ya atawayan yo so saya a liwawa nagnap la kasi so pikakabat yo?

36 Nia ikuan ko ed sikayo, Andi; ni say kaukolan yo ya ipulisay so pananisia yo, lapu ed say inagamil yo labat so pananisia yo ya añgitanem na bokel pian salien yo a kabaten no say bokel maong.

37 Tan nengneng yo, no say kiew ginmapo ya ontubo, ikuan yo: Bayuboan tayo a maalwar, pian onlamut, pian saya so ombaleg, tan mañgiter na buñga ya onkana ed sikatayo. Tan natan nia, no saya so nabayuboan ed dakel ya alwar saya so manlamut, tan ombaleg, tan mañgiter na buñga.

38 Balet no paulyan yo so kiew, tan angapo la so nunot yo ed pambayubo ed saya, nia saya so ag onlamut; tan sano onsabi so petang na agew tan saya so dangdañgen to, lapu ed angapo so lamut to saya so onlenes, tan saya so bagoten tan ibantak yo.

39 Natan, saya so aliwa lapu ed say bokel so makapoy, ni say lapu ed say buñga to so aliwa a makapaliket; balet lapu ed say dalin yo so kelang, tan ag yo binayuboan so kiew, dia ed ontan ag kayo makaala na buñga.

40 Tan dia ed onia, no ag yo bayuboan so salita, ya mantalaran kayo ya awalaan na mata na pananisia ed buñga to, ag kayo makaburbor na buñga ed kiew na bilay.

41 Balet no bayuboan yo so salita, on, bayuboan yo so kiew no ongapo la ya ontubo, dia ed pananisia yo tekepan na baleg a seet, tan katekep na anos, ya mantatalaran kayo ed buñga to, saya so onlamut; tan nengneng yo saya so manmaliw a sakey a kiew ya onsubol so andi-angaan a bilay.

42 Tan lapu ed seet yo tan say pananisia yo tan say anos yo ed salita nipaakar ed panagbayubo ed saya, pian onlamut ed sikayo, nia, dia ed nagogonuyan makaburbor kayo na buñga to nia, a saya so sankablian, a saya so sankasamitan nen say dinan a masamit, tan saya so amputi nen say dinan ya amputi, on, tan dalisay nen say amin a dalisay; tan sikayo so mampenek ed saya a buñga ya anga ed sikayo so napesel, pian sikayo so ag naerasan, ni say sikayo so napaet.

43 Dia ed saya, kaagian ko, anien yo so tumang na pananisia yo, tan seet yo, tan anos yo, tan dukey na panagtepel, a nanalagar kayo ed kiew a mañgiter na buñga ya onkana ed sikayo.
alma 33:
[center][font_size=26]Tekap 33[/font_size][/center]

[i]Si Zenos imbañgat to a saray totoo so kaukolan a mampikasi tan mañgigalang ed amin a pasen tan saray panañgokom so nipulisay lapu ed Anak—Si Zenock imbañgat to a say panañgasi so niiter lapu ed Anak—Si Moises so añgipatalindeg ed kalawakan na sakey a kanengneñgan na Anak na Dios. Ñgalñgali 74 S.C.[/i]

1 Natan kayari nen Alma ya imbaga so saraya a salita, sikara so nampabaki ed sikato lapu ed pilalek da a kabaten no sikara so kaukolan a manisia ed saksakey a Dios, pian nagamoran da so saya a buñga a sinalita to, odino panon da ya itanem so bokel, odino say salita a saya so sinalita to, ya imbaga to a saya so itanem da ed saray puso ra; odino anto a pamaakaran so pañgigapo ra ya ikana so pananisia ra.

2 Tan si Alma inkuan to ed sikara: Nia, inkuan yo ya ag kayo makapañgigalang ed Dios yo lapu ed sikayo so pinapaway da ed saray sinagogas yo. Balet nia, ikuan ko ed sikayo, no ipapasen yo ya ag kayo makapañgigalang ed Dios, baleg so liñgo yo, tan nepeg yo a sukaiten so saray masanto a kasulatan; no ipapasen yo ya imbañgat da so saraya ed sikayo, ag yo atalusan so saraya.

3 Nanunotan yo kasi so abasa yo no anto so inkuan nen Zenos, sakey a profeta ed kadaanan, nipaakar ed pikakasi odino panañgigalang?

4 Tan inkuan to: Sika so mapañgasi, O Dios, lapu ed dineñgel mo so saray pikakasik, angan sanen wala ak ed kalawakan; on, sika so mapañgasi nen nampikasi ak onkana ed saraman so kabusol ko, tan sikara so iniarap mo ed siak.

5 On, O Dios, tan sika so mapañgasi ed siak sanen siak so tinmawag ed sika sanen wala ak ed kaumaan ko; sanen siak so nannañgis ed sika ed saray pikakasik, tan dineñgel mo ak.

6 Tan lamet, O Dios, sanen inmarap ak ed abong ko siak so dineñgel mo ed saray pikakasik.

7 Tan sanen inmarap ak ed silir ko, O Katawan, tan siak so nampikasi ed sika, dineñgel mo ak.

8 On, sika so mapañgasi ed saray anak mo sanen nannañgis ira ed sika, pian nareñgel mo ira tan aliwa a saray totoo, tan sikara so dineñgel mo.

9 On, O Dios, sika so mapañgasi ed siak, tan dineñgel mo so saray nañgis ko ed pegley na saray tipon mo.

10 On, tan dineñgel mo ak sanen siak so pinapaway da tan binalaw na saray kabusol ko, on, dineñgel mo so saray pikakasik, tan nampasnok ka ed saray kabusol ko, tan sikara so dinalaw mo ed pasnok mo ed panamegley na masiglat a kadederal.

11 Tan siak so dineñgel mo lapu ed saray irap ko tan inkamatuak; tan lapu ed Anak mo kanian sika so mapañgasi ed siak, dia ed ontan siak so onnañgis ed sika ed amin ya irap ko, lapu ed sika so kawalaan na gayagak; lapu ed iniarawim ed siak so panañgokom mo, lapu ed Anak mo.

12 Tan natan si Alma inkuan to ed sikara: Manisia kayo ed saraman so masanto a kasulatan a saraya so insulat na saray wala ed kadaanan?

13 Nia, no manisia kayo, sirin manisia kayo ed inkuan nen Zenos: tan, nia inkuan to: Iniarawim so panañgokom mo lapu ed Anak mo.

14 Natan nia, kaagian ko, ontepet ak no abasa yo la so saray masanto a kasulatan? No abasa yo la, panon so ag yo panisia ed Anak na Dios?

15 Lapu ed aliwa ya insulat nen Zenos labat so salita nipaakar ed saraya a beñgatla, balet si Zenock met sinalita to so saraya a beñgatla—

16 Tan nia, inkuan to: Sika so nampasnok, O Katawan, ed saya a totoo, lapu ed ag da talusan so panañgasim ya initer mo ed sikara lapu ed Anak mo.

17 Tan natan, kaagian ko, nanengneng yo so komadua a kadaanan a profeta a pinaneknekan to so nipaakar ed Anak na Dios, tan lapu ed saray totoo ag da tinalusan so saray salita to sikato so tinutopak da anga ed inatey.

18 Balet nia, aliwa ni a saya ya amin; aliwa a sikara labat so nansalita nipaakar ed Anak na Dios.

19 Nia, sikato so sinalita nen Moises; on, tan say kanengneñgan to so nipatalindeg ed kalawakan, a siopaman ya ontangwa ed saya so nabilay. Tan dakel so saray ninmengneng tan sikara so abilay.

20 Balet pigpigara so akatalus ed kabaliksan na saraman a beñgatla, tan saya lapu ed awet na saray puso ra. Balet wala so dakerakel ya inmawet ya ag ira ninmengneng, dia ed ontan sikara so inatey. Natan say makaseñgeg no akin ag ira ninmengneng lapu ed ag ira manisia a saya so makatambal ed sikara.

21 O kaagian ko, no sikayo so natambal ed pañgiwandag yo na mata yo labat pian sikayo so natambal, ag yo kasi nengneñgen a tampol, odino lablabayen yo ni a paaweten so saray puso yo ed ag-pananisia, tan sikayo so mañgiras, ya ag yo iwandag so saray mata yo, pian sikayo so ompatey?

22 No ontan, abagey so onsabi ed sikayo; balet no andi, sirin iwandag yo so saray mata yo tan gapoan yo so manisia ed Anak na Dios, a sikato so onsabi a manundon ed saray totoo to, tan sikato so manirap tan ompatey pian mamaandi na saray kasalanan yo; tan sikato so onoli ed bilay lamet a manlapu ed saray inaatey, a saya so nagawa na kioli ed bilay, pian amin a totoo so ontalindeg ed arap to, a naokom ed sampot tan agew na panañgokom, unong ed saray kimey da.

23 Tan natan, kaagian ko, pilalek ko ya itanem yo so saya a salita ed saray puso yo, tan sano ongapo la ya ombaleg iñgen bayuboan yo ed panamegley na pananisia yo. Tan nia, saya so manmaliw a sakey a kiew, a saya so onsubol ed sikayo ya onkana ed andi-angaan a bilay. Tan dia ed ontan komon say Dios iter to ed sikayo a saray sasakbaten yo so onlemew, ed panamegley na gayaga ed Anak to. Tan angan saya ya amin nayarian yo a gawaen no labay yo. Amen.
alma 34:
[center][font_size=26]Tekap 34[/font_size][/center]

[i]Si Amulek pinaneknekan to a say salita so wala ed si Cristo onkana ed kilalaban—Anga ed say bagat a pamaandi na kasalanan so nagawa, amin a totoo so kaukolan ya ompatey—Say katibukelan na gangan nen Moises itoturo to so bagat na Anak na Dios—Say andi-angaan a plano na pananundon so akasaral ed pananisia tan pambabawi—Mampikasi onkana ed saray makalaman tan makaespiritu a bendicion—Saya a bilay so panaon pian saray totoo so mamparaan a miarap ed Dios—Kimeyan yo so kilalaban yo katekep so takot ed Dios. Ñgalñgali 74 S.C.[/i]

1 Tan natan agawa a kayari ya imbaga nen Alma so saraya a salita ed sikara sikato so inmirong ed dalin, tan inmalagey si Amulek tan ginapoan to so mambañgat ed sikara, a nankuan:

2 Kaagian ko, dia ed nunot ko ag nayari a sikayo so ag makapikabat ed saray beñgatla ya asalita nipaakar ed isabi nen Cristo, a saya so imbañgat mi ya Anak na Dios; on, kabat ko a saraya a beñgatla so nibañgat la ed sikayo a malaelaem sakbay na insian yo manlapu ed limog mi.

3 Tan unong a nampilalekan yo ed inararok ya agik ya ipakabat to ed sikayo no anto so gawaen yo, lapu ed saray irap yo; tan sikato so nansalita ed sikayo pian iparaan to so kanunotan yo; on, tan sikato so nankuyong ed sikayo nipaakar ed pananisia tan anos—

4 On, angan pian nawalaan kayo na baleg a pananisia ya angan itanem yo so salita ed saray puso yo, pian nasali yo so kaabigan to nia.

5 Tan anengneng mi a say baleg a tepet so wala ed kanunotan yo no kasi say salita wala ed Anak na Dios, odino angapo so Cristo.

6 Tan anengneng yo met a si agik pinaneknekan to ed sikayo, ed dakel a pamaakaran, a say salita wala ed Cristo onkana ed kilalaban.

7 Si agik binitla to so saray salita nen Zenos, a say pananundon onsabi ed panamegley na Anak na Dios, tan ontan met ed saray salita nen Zenock; tan ontan met sikato so dinmoñget ed si Moises, pian paneknekan to a saraya a beñgatla so tua.

8 Tan natan, nia, paneknekan ko ed sikayo ed siak a dili a saraya a beñgatla so tua. Nia, ikuan ko ed sikayo, kabat ko a si Cristo so onsabi ed limog na saray anak na totoo, pian akoen to ed inkasikato so saray kasalanan na totoo to, tan sikato so mamaandi ed saray kasalanan na mundo; lapu ed say Katawan a Dios saya so sinalita to.

9 Lapu ed kaukolan a sakey a bagat a pamaandi na kasalanan so nagawa; tan unong ed makana a plano na Andi-angaan a Dios kaukolan wala so bagat a pamaandi na kasalanan a nagawa, odino amin a katooan so andi-saew a nabalang; on, amin da so inmawet; on, amin da so nigapol tan abalang, tan sikara so nabalang likud ed panamegley na bagat a pamaandi na kasalanan a saya so kaukolan a nagawa.

10 Lapu ed kaukolan a wala so baleg tan sampot a bagat; on, aliwa a bagat na sakey a too, ni say ayep, ni say dinanman a nengneng na manok; tan saya so aliwa a bagat na too; balet saya so kaukolan a malaknab tan andi-angaan a bagat.

11 Natan angapo so angan sakey a too a nayarian to ya ibagat so dili a dala to ya onkana a pamaandi na kasalanan na sananey. Natan, no say sakey a too so akapatey, nia say gangan tayo, a saya so maptek, ekalen to so bilay na agi to? Ikuan ko ed sikayo, Andi.

12 Balet say gangan kaukolan to so bilay na saman so akapatey; dia ed ontan angapo so sakey a malaknab a bagat a pamaandi na kasalanan a nagnap ya onkana ed saray kasalanan na mundo.

13 Dia ed ontan, kaukolan sirin a wala so sakey a baleg tan sampot a bagat, tan dia ed saya wala so, odino kaukolan so, itonda na pamaterter na dala; dia ed saya say gangan nen Moises so asumpal la; on, amin so nasumpal, balang sakey a tulnek tan melag a tanda, tan angapo so ompatey.

14 Tan nia, saya so katibukelan a kabaliksan na gangan, balang sakey a sankamelagan a beñgatla so mañgitoturo ed saya a baleg tan sampot a bagat; tan saman so baleg tan sampot a bagat so say Anak na Dios, on, malaknab tan andi-angaan.

15 Tan dia ed onia awiten to so kilalaban ed amin a manisia ed ñgaran to; tan saya so gagala na sampot a bagat, say pañgawit to ed sankaaraleman a panañgasi, ya ontaluna ed kaptekan, tan awiten to so agamil ed saray totoo pian nawalaan ira na pananisia ya onkana ed pambabawi.

16 Tan dia ed onia say panañgasi peneken to so pankaukolan na kaptekan, tan liktoben to ra ed taklay na andi-kaatapan, balet saman so ag mañgikana na pananisia ya onkana ed pambabawi so akaparungtal ed tibukel a gangan na pankaukolan na kaptekan; dia ed ontan saman labat so awalaan na pananisia ya onkana ed pambabawi so naawit ed baleg tan andi-angaan a plano na pananundon.

17 Dia ed ontan say Dios komon iter to ed sikayo, kaagian ko, pian komon gapoan yo ya ikana so pananisia yo ed pambabawi, a gapoan yo so ontawag ed masanto a ñgaran to, pian sikato so nawalaan na panañgasi ed sikayo;

18 On, kerew kayo ed sikato na panañgasi; lapu ed sikato so makapanyari a mañgilaban.

19 On, mampaabeba kayo ed inkasikayo, tan ituloy yo so pampikasi ed sikato.

20 Manpikasi kayo ed sikato sano wala kayo ed kaumaan yo, on, onkana ed amin ya ayayep yo.

21 Manpikasi kayo ed sikato dia ed loob na saray abong yo, on, onkana ed amin a kabobung yo, mandapag dia ed kabuasan, kaaguan, tan dia ed labi.

22 On, manpikasi kayo ed sikato sumpa ed pakapanyari na saray kabusol yo.

23 On, manpikasi kayo ed sikato sumpa ed demonyo, a sikato so kabusol na amin ya inkamatunong.

24 Manpikasi kayo ed sikato ya onkana ed saray tanem yo ed kaumaan yo, pian komon sikayo so onaliguas lapu ed saraya.

25 Manpikasi kayo ya onkana ed saray ayayep yo a wala ed kaumaan, pian komon saraya so ondakel.

26 Balet aliwa ni a saya ya amin; kaukolan ya ibesñgaw yo so pikakasi na saray kamarerua yo dia ed saray silir yo, tan dia ed saray maamot a pasen yo, tan dia ed saray kalawakan yo.

27 On, tan sano ag kayo onnañgis ed Katawan, pano yo so saray puso yo, na pikakasi ed sikato ya andi-tonda onkana ed pankaabigan yo, tan ontan met ed pankaabigan na saray wala ed kaliber-liber yo.

28 Tan natan nia, inararok a kaagian, ikuan ko ed sikayo, ag yo ipapasen a saya la ya amin; tan kayari yo a ginawa so saraya ya amin a beñgatla, no ipulisay yo a paarawien so saray mankakaukolan, tan saray alakseban, tan ag yo dalawen so saray mansasakit tan manlilikna na kairapan, tan iapag yo so saray tagano yo, no wala ed sikayo, ed saraman so wala ed pankaukolan—ikuan ko ed sikayo, no ag yo gawaen so saraya a beñgatla, nia, saray pikakasi yo angapo so kakanaan da, tan angapo so gungona yo, tan kapara yo so saray mankonkonwari ya iboburi ra so pananisia.

29 Dia ed ontan, no ag yo nunoten so panmaliw a matulong, sikayo so siñga gaer, ya ibantak na saray managsuri, (lapu ed angapo so kana to nia) tan saya so gatin-gatinan na sali na saray totoo.

30 Tan natan, kaagian ko, pirawat ko, kayari yo a naawat so dakerakel a tasi, ya anengneng yo a say masanto a kasulatan so mamaneknek ed saraya a beñgatla, dago kayo tan mamapaway kayo na buñga ya onkana ed pambabawi.

31 On, pirawat ko ya ondago kayo tan ag yo la papaaweten so saray puso yo; tan nia, natan so panaon tan agew na kilalaban yo; tan dia ed ontan, no sikayo so mambabawi tan ag yo paaweten so saray puso yo, tampol a say baleg a plano na pananundon so onsabi ed sikayo.

32 Tan nia, saya a bilay so panaon na saray totoo a mamparaan a miarap ed Dios; on, nia say agew ed saya a bilay so agew ed saray totoo a mangawa na saray kimey da.

33 Tan natan, unong ed asalitak la ed sikayo ya inmuna, lapu ed awalaan kayo na dakerakel a tasi, dia ed ontan, pikasik ed sikayo ya ag yo la ipapaleen so agew na pambabawi yo ya anga ed kasampotan; tan dia ed kayari na saya ya agew na bilay, a niiter ed sikatayo a mamparaan onkana ed andi-angaan, nia, no ag tayo paabigen so saray panaon tayo legan a wala tayo ed saya a bilay, dia ed saya onsabi so labi na kabiluñgetan ya angapo la so kimey a nagawaan.

34 Ag yo nibaga, no sikayo so naawit ed saman so makapataktakot a kairapan, a siak so mambabawi, a siak so ompawil ed Dios ko. Andi, ag yo nibaga so saya; lapu ed saya met lamlamang ya espiritu a makankayarian na laman yo ed saya a panaon na ipaway yo ed saya a bilay, saman met lamlamang ya espiritu so walaan na pakapanyari a mankayarian ed laman yo diman ed andi-angaan a mundo.

35 Tan nia, no impaleen yo so agew na pambabawi yo anga ed patey, nia, sikayo so manmaliw ya oleyan na espiritu na demonyo, tan sikayo la so tatakan to a kayarian to; dia ed ontan, say Espiritu na Katawan so ontaynan la ed sikayo, tan angapo la so pasen to ed sikayo, tan say demonyo wala la ya amin so pakapanyari to ed sikayo; tan saya so sankasampotan a kipapasen na saray marelmeng.

36 Tan saya so kabat ko, lapu ed say Katawan inkuan to ya ag to manaayam ed dalem na saray aliwa a masanto a templo, balet dia ed puso na saray matunong so panayaman to; on, tan inkuan to met a saray matunong so onyurong ed panarian to, ya ag la ra ompaway; balet saray kawes da so nagawa ya amputi ed panamegley na dala na Cordero.

37 Tan natan, inararok a kaagian, pilalek ko a tandaan yo so saraya a beñgatla, tan nepeg a panseetan yo so mankimey ed kilalaban yo a sitatakot ed arap na Dios, tan ag yo la iboburi so isabi nen Cristo;

38 Tan ag kayo la onsasaluñgat sumpa ed Espiritu Santo, balet sikato so awaten yo, tan akoen yo ed inkasikayo so ñgaran nen Cristo; ya ipaabeba yo so inkasikayo anga ed sapok, tan igalang yo so Dios, ed inerman a pasen a kawalaan yo, ed espiritu tan dia ed katuaan; tan mambilay kayo ed pisasalamat ed inagew-agew, onkana ed saray dakel a panañgasi tan saray bendicion ya initer to ed sikayo.

39 On, tan bilinen takayo met, kaagian ko, a manalwar kayo ed panamegley na pikakasi ya andi-tonda, pian ag kayo niarawi ed saray tukso na demonyo, pian ag to kayo taloen, pian ag kayo manmaliw ya oleyan to ed sampot ya agew; tan nia, tumañgan to kayo na aliwa a maabig a beñgatla.

40 Tan natan inararok a kaagian, bilinen takayo a mananos, tan mantepel kayo ed amin a kanengneñgan na irap; ya ag yo la balawen so saraman so amapaway ed sikayo lapu ed mapalalo ya inkaduka yo, ag la piga a manmaliw kayo a managkasalanan a siñga sikara;

41 Balet sikayo so nawalaan na anos, tan itepel yo so saray irap, tekep na ag-nagiing ya ilalo ya onsabi so agew sikayo so mampainawa manlapu ed saray kairapan yo.
alma 35:
[center][font_size=26]Tekap 35[/font_size][/center]

[i]Say impampulong na salita dineral to so kasiliban na saray Zoramite—Pinapaway da so saray apasimbalo ed pananisia, a dia ed saya sikara so akiolop ed saray totoo nen Ammon ed Jershon—Si Alma so nanermen lapu ed karelmeñgan na saray totoo. Ñgalñgali 74 S.C.[/i]

1 Natan agawa a kayari nen Amulek a sinampotan to so saraya a salita, insian da so inkasikara ed karaklan tan linma ra ed dalin na Jershon.

2 On, tan say nakdaan ed saray kaagian da, kayari ra ya impulong so salita ed saray Zoramite, sikara met so linma ed dalin na Jershon.

3 Tan agawa kayari a saray seseleñgen a kabiañgan na saray Zoramite so nankokonuan nipaakar ed saray salita a nipulong ed sikara, sikara so nampasnok makaseñgeg ed salita, lapu ed aderal so kasiliban da; dia ed ontan ag da labay so ondeñgel ed saray salita.

4 Tan sikara so nampabaki tan tinipon da ed amin a sakop na dalin so amin a totoo, tan inkono ra ed sikara so nipaakar ed saray salita a nibalikas.

5 Natan saray manañgoley da tan saray sacerdote ra tan saray managbañgat da ag da impaamta ed saray totoo so saray pilalek da; dia ed ontan akabatan da a maamot no anto so wala ed kanunotan na amin a totoo.

6 Tan agawa kayari ra ya asukayan so wala ed kanunotan na amin a totoo, saray maabubon ed saray salita ya imbalikas nen Alma tan saray kaagian to so pinapaway da ed saman a dalin; tan sikara so dakerakel; tan sikara met so linma ed dalin na Jershon.

7 Tan agawa a si Alma tan saray kaagian to so nantalima ed sikara.

8 Natan saray totoo a Zoramite ampetang so ulo ra ed saray totoo nen Ammon a wala ed Jershon, tan say manunaan a manañgoley na saray Zoramite, lapu ed sikato so mapalalo a marelmeng a too, so nampabaki ed saray totoo nen Ammon a pilalek to ed sikara a papawayen da ed dalin da so amin a nanlapu ed sikara a linma ed dalin da.

9 Tan imbesñgaw to ed sikara so dakerakel a panagtaktakot sumpa ed sikara. Tan natan saray totoo nen Ammon ag ira tinmakot ed saray salita ra; dia ed ontan ag da ra pinapaway, balet inawat da ya amin so duka na saray Zoramite a linma ed sikara; tan sikara so tinagano ra, tan kinawesan da ra, tan initer da ed sikara so saray dalin a tawiren da; tan sikara so tinalima unong ed kaukolan da.

10 Natan saya so amagalaw ed saray Zoramite a mampasnok sumpa ed saray totoo nen Ammon, tan ginapoan da so milimog ed saray Lamanite tan pian pagalawen da ra met a mampasnok sumpa ed sikara.

11 Tan dia ed onia saray Zoramite tan saray Lamanite ginapoan da so mamparaan onkana ed bakal sumpa ed saray totoo nen Ammon, tan ontan met sumpa ed saray Nephite.

12 Tan dia ed onia so impansampot na komalabimpito a taon ya oley na saray okom ed saray totoo nen Nephi.

13 Tan saray totoo nen Ammon so tinmaynan a pinmaway ed dalin na Jershon, tan linma ra ed dalin na Melek, tan impalugar da so dalin na Jershon ed saray ñgayew na Nephite, pian sikara so mibaliñgaan ed saray ñgayew na Lamanite tan saray ñgayew na Zoramite; tan dia ed onia ginmapo so bakal na saray Lamanite sumpa ed saray Nephite, dia ed komalabinwalo a taon ya oley na saray okom; tan say kasulatan na saray bakal da so niiter ed mansaguinunor.

14 Tan si Alma, tan si Ammon, tan saray kaagian da, tan ontan met ed saray duara a lalaki ya anak nen Alma so pinmawil ed dalin na Zarahemla, kayari a sikara so nikana ed lima na Dios ed impañgawit na dakel a Zoramite ed pambabawi; tan no kaonoñgan karakel so saray naawit ed pambabawi sikara so asunson ed paway na dalin da; balet wala so dalin a tawir da ed dalin na Jershon, tan inala ra so saray ayura ra pian iagel da sa inkasikara, tan saray kaasawaan da, tan saray anak da, tan saray dalin da.

15 Natan si Alma, lapu ed sikato so nanermen lapu ed karelmeñgan na saray totoo to, on lapu ed saray bakal, tan panagpaterter na dala, tan saray baliñgaan a wala ed limog da; tan lapu ed sikato so añgibawag na salita, odino añgibaki na mañgibawag na salita, ed limog na amin a totoo ed balang sakey a ciudad; tan dia ed impakanengneng to na saray puso na totoo so ginmapo ya onawet, tan ginapoan da so nabaiñgan lapu ed mapalalo ya elet na salita, say puso to so mapalalo a maermen.

16 Dia ed ontan, kinaliktan to a saray anak to a lalaki so natipon, pian iter to ed balang sakey so betang da a sumpalen, ya akabiig, nipaakar ed saray beñgatla ed inkamatunong. Tan wala so kasulatan na saray gangan to, ya initer to ed sikara unong ed dili a kasulatan to.
alma 36:
Saray gangan nen Alma ed laki ya anak to a si Helaman.

Sakopen to so tekap 36 tan 37.

[center][font_size=26]Tekap 36[/font_size][/center]

[i]Si Alma pinaneknekan to ed si Helaman so impakapasimbalo to ed pananisia kayari impakanengneng to na sakey ya angel—Sikato so nantepel na irap na sakey a naayew a kamarerua; sikato so tinmawag ed ñgaran nen Jesus, tan sikato so nianak ed Dios—Masamit a gayaga so amano ed kamarerua to—Anengneng to so dakel ya olop na saray angeles a mandadayew ed Dios—Dakel ya apasimbalo ed pananisia so akataway tan akanengneng na siñga atawayan tan anengneng to. Ñgalñgali 74 S.C.[/i]

1 Anak ko, italineng mo so saray layag mo ed salitak; tan sambaan ko ed sika, ya unong ya onoren mo so saray gangan na Dios sika so onaliguas ed dalin.

2 Pirawat ko a gawaen mo so siñga say ginawak, ed pannunot mo ed inkadakep na kaamaan tayo; lapu ed sikara so wala ed inkaaripen, tan angapo so makapañgilaban ed sikara likud ed say Dios nen Abraham, tan say Dios nen Isaac, tan say Dios nen Jacob; tan sikato so petepeteg ya añgilaban ed sikara ed saray kairapan da.

3 Tan natan, O anak ko a Helaman, nia, wala ka ed kalangweran mo; tan dia ed ontan, kerewen ko ed sika a deñgelen mo so saray salitak tan siak so panaralan mo; lapu ed kabat ko a siopaman ya iter to so talek to ed Dios so naampaya ed saray subok da, tan saray gutgot da, tan saray irap da, tan sikara so nitanduro ed sampot ya agew.

4 Tan ag ko labay a nunoten mo a kabat ko so inkasiak—aliwa a lapu ed inkalaman balet dia ed inkaespiritu, aliwa a dia ed minomundo a kanunotan balet dia ed Dios.

5 Natan, nia, ikuan ko ed sika, no ag ak nianak ed Dios ag ko akabatan so saraya a beñgatla; balet say Dios initer to, ed panamegley na sañgi na masanto ya angel to, impakabat to so saraya a beñgatla ed siak, aliwa a lapu ed pankanepegan ko a dili;

6 Lapu ed siak so nanliber-liber a kaibak so saray lalaki ya anak nen Mosiah, ya aanapen mi a deralen so simbaan na Dios; balet nia, say Dios imbaki to so masanto ya angel to ya amatonda ed sikami ed dalan.

7 Tan nia, sikato so nansalita ed sikami, a siñga tanol na karul, tan say tibukel a dalin so ginmiwgiw ed leksab na saray sali mi; tan sikami ya amin so niparukol ed dalin, lapu ed say takot ed Katawan so sinmabi ed sikami.

8 Balet nia, say voces inkuan to ed siak: Bañgon ka. Tan binmañgon ak tan tinmalindeg ak, tan anengneng ko so angel.

9 Tan inkuan to ed siak: No dia ed inkasika a dili so naderal, ag mo la seseetan a deralen so simbaan na Dios.

10 Tan agawa a niparukol ak ed dalin; tan saya dia ed loob na talora ya agew tan talora a labi ya ag ko nabiswat so sañgik, ni say nikanak so saray salik tan taklay ko.

11 Tan say angel nansalita na dakel ni a beñgatla ed siak, a saraya so nadñgel na saray kaagian ko, balet ag ko ra nadñgel; tan sanen nadñgel ko so saray salita—No sika so naderal ed inkasika a dili, ag mo la seseetan a deralen so simbaan na Dios—abakbak ak na ontan la a kabaleg na takot tan pankelaw ag la piga siak so naderal, kanian siak so niparukol ed dalin tan angapo la so nadñgel ko.

12 Balet siak so minmayegmeg ed andi-angaan a dusa, lapu ed say kamareruak so inmaburido ya anga ed sankabalegan ya irap tan mayegmeg katekep to ya amin so kasalanan ko.

13 On, anunotan ko ya amin so kasalanan tan karelmeñgan ko, a saraya so nandusa ed siak na irap na infierno; on, anengneng ko a sinmaluñgat ak sumpa ed Dios ko, tan ag ko inonor so saray masanto a gangan to.
